trans-unit.source: col_name (string) – The name of the variable to be plotted.
trans-unit.target: col_name（字符串）–要绘制的变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: col_name (string) – The variable to be plotted on the horizontal axis.
trans-unit.target: col_name（字符串）–要在水平轴上绘制的变量。

trans-unit.source: col_scores (array-like) – An array of numeric column scores
trans-unit.target: col_scores（array-like）–数字列分数的数组

trans-unit.source: color_max (html color) – default is ‘yellow’. color for background of row maximum
trans-unit.target: color_max（html color）–默认为“黄色”。行最大值背景的颜色

trans-unit.source: color_row_patterns (boolean) – If True, color the unique row patterns, otherwise use grey and white as colors.
trans-unit.target: color_row_patterns（boolean）–如果为True，则为唯一的行图案上色，否则使用灰色和白色作为颜色。

trans-unit.source: colors (list, optional) – If given, must have length == number of levels in trace.
trans-unit.target: 颜色（list ，可选）–如果给定，则其长度必须为==跟踪级别数。

trans-unit.source: cols (array-like, optional) – cols specifies which confidence intervals to return
trans-unit.target: cols（类似数组，可选）– cols 指定要返回的置信区间

trans-unit.source: column (array-like, optional) – Must be used on its own. Can be 0d or 1d see below.
trans-unit.target: column（array-like ，optional）–必须单独使用。可以是0d或1d，请参见下文。

trans-unit.source: column_order (string) – The method for ordering the columns. Must be one of ‘pattern’, ‘proportion’, or ‘raw’.
trans-unit.target: column_order（string）–排序列的方法。必须是“模式”，“比例”或“原始”之一。

trans-unit.source: combine_terms (None or list of strings) – Each string in this list is matched to the name of the terms or the name of the exogenous variables. All columns whose name includes that string are combined in one joint test.
trans-unit.target: Combine_terms（无或字符串列表）–此列表中的每个字符串都与术语名称或外生变量的名称匹配。名称包含该字符串的所有列将在一个联合测试中合并。

trans-unit.source: companion_matrix
trans-unit.target: companion_matrix

trans-unit.source: comparison_name (string, optional) – if provided, plot_intervals will color code all groups that are significantly different from the comparison_name red, and will color code insignificant groups gray. Otherwise, all intervals will just be plotted in black.
trans-unit.target: comparison_name（string ，optional）–如果提供，plot_intervals将对所有与compare_name显着不同的组进行颜色编码，并对无关紧要的组进行灰色编码。否则，所有间隔只会以黑色绘制。

trans-unit.source: component (array or vector of principal component indices) –
trans-unit.target: 分量（主分量索引的数组或向量）–

trans-unit.source: component (neqs x neqs array, default to largest for each) – Index of column of eigenvector/value to use for each error band Note: period of impulse (t=0) is not included when computing principle component
trans-unit.target: 分量（neqs x neqs数组，每个分量默认为最大）–用于每个误差带的特征向量/值的列索引注意：计算原理分量时不包括脉冲周期（t = 0）

trans-unit.source: component (vector length neqs, default to largest for each) – Index of column of eigenvector/value to use for each error band Note: period of impulse (t=0) is not included when computing principle component
trans-unit.target: 分量（向量长度neqs ，默认为每个的最大值）–每个误差带要使用的本征向量/值的列索引注意：计算原理分量时不包括脉冲周期（t = 0）

trans-unit.source: cond_means (array-like, optional) – If provided, the columns of this array span the space of the conditional means E[exog | focus exog], where exog ranges over some or all of the columns of exog (other than the focus exog).
trans-unit.target: cond_means（类似数组，可选）–如果提供，则此数组的列跨越条件均值E [exog | 焦点exog]，其中exog覆盖exog的部分或全部列（不包括focus exog）。

trans-unit.source: conditional (bool, optional) – If True, the integral is corrected by the conditional probability of the integration interval. The return value is the expectation of the function, conditional on being in the given interval. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: 条件的（bool ，可选的）–如果为True，则通过积分间隔的条件概率来校正积分。返回值是函数的期望值，条件是处于给定的时间间隔内。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: conditional (boolean or int, optional) – Whether or not to return predictions conditional on current or past regimes. If False, returns a single vector of weighted predictions. If True or 1, returns predictions conditional on the current regime. For larger integers, returns predictions conditional on the current regime and some number of past regimes.
trans-unit.target: 有条件的（布尔值或int ，可选）–是否以当前或过去的条件为条件返回预测。如果为False，则返回加权预测的单个向量。如果为True或1，则返回以当前体制为条件的预测。对于较大的整数，返回以当前状态和一定数量的过去状态为条件的预测。

trans-unit.source: conf_int – An array with lower, upper confidence intervals for the marginal effects.
trans-unit.target: conf_int –具有较低，较高置信区间的边际效应数组。

trans-unit.source: conf_int – Each row contains [lower, upper] limits of the confidence interval for the corresponding parameter. The first column contains all lower, the second column contains all upper limits.
trans-unit.target: conf_int –每行包含相应参数的置信区间的[上下限]。第一列包含所有下限，第二列包含所有上限。

trans-unit.source: conf_int (array) – 2d array of the confidence interval for the forecast
trans-unit.target: conf_int（array）–预测置信区间的2d数组

trans-unit.source: confint – Array of [lower, upper] confidence levels for each category, such that overall coverage is (approximately) 1-alpha.
trans-unit.target: confint –每个类别的[较低，较高]置信水平的数组，这样，总覆盖范围为（大约） 1-alpha 。

trans-unit.source: confint (array, optional) – Confidence intervals for the ACF. Returned if confint is not None.
trans-unit.target: confint（数组，可选）– ACF的置信区间。如果confint不为None，则返回。

trans-unit.source: confint (array, optional) – Confidence intervals for the PACF. Returned if confint is not None.
trans-unit.target: confint（数组，可选）– PACF的置信区间。如果confint不为None，则返回。

trans-unit.source: confint (bool, float) – Whether to return confidence intervals. If confint == True, 95 % confidence intervals are returned. Else if confint is a float, then it is assumed to be the alpha value of the confidence interval. That is confint == .05 returns a 95% confidence interval, and .10 would return a 90% confidence interval. value is start.
trans-unit.target: confint（bool ，float）–是否返回置信区间。如果 confint == True，则返回95％的置信区间。否则，如果 confint 是一个浮点数，则假定它是置信区间的alpha值。那就是confint == .05返回95％的置信区间，而.10将返回90％的置信区间。值是 start 。

trans-unit.source: conserve_memory (int, optional) – Determines what output from the filter to store. Default is to store everything.
trans-unit.target: conserve_memory（int ，optional）–确定要存储过滤器的输出。默认为存储所有内容。

trans-unit.source: conserve_memory (integer, optional) – Bitmask value to set the memory conservation method to. See notes for details.
trans-unit.target: conserve_memory（整数，可选）–设置内存保留方法的位掩码值。有关详细信息，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: const (ndarray (neqs x 1) or (neqs x 0)) – If a constant deterministic term outside the cointegration is specified within the deterministic parameter, then const is the first column of det_coef_coint. Otherwise it’s an ndarray of size zero.
trans-unit.target: const（ndarray（neqs x 1）或（neqs x 0））–如果在确定性参数中指定了协整之外的常数确定性项，则 const 是 det_coef_coint 的第一列。否则，它是大小为零的ndarray。

trans-unit.source: const_coint (ndarray (1 x coint_rank)) – If there is a constant deterministic term inside the cointegration relation, then const_coint is the first row of det_coef_coint. Otherwise it’s an ndarray of zeros.
trans-unit.target: const_coint（ndarray（1× coint_rank ）） -如果存在的协整关系内的恒定确定性术语，然后 const_coint 是第一行的 det_coef_coint 。否则，它是零的ndarray。

trans-unit.source: constrained – Array of constrained parameters which may be used in likelihood evalation.
trans-unit.target: 约束 –约束参数数组，可用于似然评估。

trans-unit.source: constrained – Constrained parameters of, e.g., an autoregressive or moving average component, to be transformed to arbitrary parameters used by the optimizer.
trans-unit.target: 约束 –将例如自回归或移动平均成分的约束参数转换为优化器使用的任意参数。

trans-unit.source: constrained – Constrained parameters used in likelihood evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 约束 –用于似然评估的约束参数。

trans-unit.source: constrained – Transformed coefficient matrices leading to a stationary VAR representation. Will match the type of the passed unconstrained variable (so if a list was passed, a list will be returned).
trans-unit.target: 约束 -转换后的系数矩阵导致平稳的VAR表示。将与传递的 unconstrained 变量的类型匹配（因此，如果传递了列表，则将返回列表）。

trans-unit.source: constrained – Unconstrained parameters used by the optimizer.
trans-unit.target: 约束 -优化器使用的不受约束的参数。

trans-unit.source: constrained (array) – Constrained parameters of, e.g., an autoregressive or moving average component, to be transformed to arbitrary parameters used by the optimizer.
trans-unit.target: 约束（数组）–例如，自回归或移动平均成分的约束参数，将被转换为优化器使用的任意参数。

trans-unit.source: constrained (array or list) – Constrained parameters of, e.g., an autoregressive or moving average component, to be transformed to arbitrary parameters used by the optimizer. If a list, should be a list of length order, where each element is an array sized k_endog x k_endog. If an array, should be the coefficient matrices horizontally concatenated and sized k_endog x k_endog * order.
trans-unit.target: 约束（数组或列表）–例如，自回归或移动平均成分的约束参数，将其转换为优化器使用的任意参数。如果是列表，则应为长度 order 的列表，其中每个元素都是大小为 k_endog x k_endog 的数组。如果是数组，则应为水平连接的系数矩阵并确定其大小 k_endog x k_endog * order 。

trans-unit.source: constrained (array_like) – Array of constrained parameters used in likelihood evalution, to be transformed.
trans-unit.target: constrained（array_like）–似然评估中要转换的约束参数数组。

trans-unit.source: constrained (array_like) – Constrained parameters used in likelihood evaluation.
trans-unit.target: 约束（array_like）–似然评估中使用的约束参数。

trans-unit.source: constraint ((ndarray, ndarray)) – If provided, the constraint is a tuple (L, R) such that the model parameters are estimated under the constraint L * param = R, where L is a q x p matrix and R is a q-dimensional vector. If constraint is provided, a score test is performed to compare the constrained model to the unconstrained model.
trans-unit.target: 约束（（ndarray ，ndarray ））–如果提供，则约束为元组（L，R），以便在约束L * param = R下估计模型参数，其中L为aqxp矩阵，R为q维向量。如果提供了约束，则执行分数测试以将约束模型与非约束模型进行比较。

trans-unit.source: constraints (formula expression or tuple) – If it is a tuple, then the constraint needs to be given by two arrays (constraint_matrix, constraint_value), i.e. (R, q). Otherwise, the constraints can be given as strings or list of strings. see t_test for details
trans-unit.target: 约束（公式表达式或元组）–如果是元组，则约束必须由两个数组（constraint_matrix，constraint_value），即（R，q）给出。否则，约束可以给出为字符串或字符串列表。请参阅t_test了解详细信息

trans-unit.source: continuity (bool or float) – adjust the rejection region for the normal power probability. This has and effect only if dist='norm'
trans-unit.target: 连续性（布尔或浮动）–调整正常功率概率的拒绝区域。仅当 dist='norm' 此方法才有效

trans-unit.source: contrast_L (True or False) – Whether to show contrast_L matrix
trans-unit.target: contrast_L（真或假） -是否显示contrast_L矩阵

trans-unit.source: conv (string) – Indicates the convergence criteria. Available options are “coefs” (the coefficients), “weights” (the weights in the iteration), “sresid” (the standardized residuals), and “dev” (the un-normalized log-likelihood for the M estimator). The default is “dev”.
trans-unit.target: conv（字符串）–表示收敛标准。可用的选项是“系数”（系数），“权重”（迭代中的权重），“残差”（标准化残差）和“ dev”（M估计量的非标准化对数似然）。默认值为“ dev”。

trans-unit.source: converged (bool) – indicator for convergence of the optimization. True if the norm of the score is smaller than a threshold
trans-unit.target: converged（bool）–优化收敛的指标。如果分数的范数小于阈值，则为True

trans-unit.source: convert_dates (dict) – Dictionary mapping column of datetime types to the stata internal format that you want to use for the dates. Options are ‘tc’, ‘td’, ‘tm’, ‘tw’, ‘th’, ‘tq’, ‘ty’. Column can be either a number or a name.
trans-unit.target: convert_dates（dict）– datetime类型的字典映射列到您要用于日期的stata内部格式。选项为“ tc”，“ td”，“ tm”，“ tw”，“ th”，“ tq”，“ ty”。列可以是数字或名称。

trans-unit.source: convert_dates (bool) – If convert_dates is True, then Stata formatted dates will be converted to datetime types according to the variable’s format.
trans-unit.target: convert_dates（bool）–如果convert_dates为True，则Stata格式的日期将根据变量的格式转换为datetime类型。

trans-unit.source: coords (list, optional) – If ret_coords is True, return a tuple of arrays (x_coords, y_coords).
trans-unit.target: coords（列表，可选）–如果ret_coords为True，则返回一个数组元组（x_coords，y_coords）。

trans-unit.source: cormat – The thresholded correlation matrix, in COO format.
trans-unit.target: cormat – COO格式的阈值相关矩阵。

trans-unit.source: corr0 (float) – Hypothesized value to be tested
trans-unit.target: corr0（float）–要测试的假设值

trans-unit.source: corr (array-like) – Directly specify the correlation matrix instead of estimating it from endog. If provided, endog is not used for the factor analysis, it may be used in post-estimation.
trans-unit.target: corr（类似数组）–直接指定相关矩阵，而不是从 endog 估计它。如果提供了 endog ，则不将其用于因子分析，而可以将其用于估计后。

trans-unit.source: corr (array_like, 2d) – correlation matrix, see Notes
trans-unit.target: corr（array_like ，2d）–相关矩阵，请参见注释

trans-unit.source: corr (ndarray (subclass)) – correlation matrix
trans-unit.target: corr（ndarray（subclass））–相关矩阵

trans-unit.source: corr (ndarray, (k, k)) – initial correlation matrix
trans-unit.target: corr（ndarray ，（k ，k ））–初始相关矩阵

trans-unit.source: corr (square array) – The target matrix (to which the nearest correlation matrix is sought). Must be square, but need not be positive semidefinite.
trans-unit.target: corr（方阵）–目标矩阵（寻求最接近的相关矩阵）。必须为正方形，但不必为正半定号。

trans-unit.source: corr_ (ndarray, (optional)) – corrected correlation matrix
trans-unit.target: corr_（ndarray，（可选））–校正后的相关矩阵

trans-unit.source: corr_new – corrected correlation matrix
trans-unit.target: corr_new –校正的相关矩阵

trans-unit.source: corrcoef (float or array_like) – specifies correlation matrix in one of three ways, see notes
trans-unit.target: corrcoef（float 或array_like）–以以下三种方式之一指定相关矩阵，请参见注释

trans-unit.source: correction – Correction factor for variance.
trans-unit.target: 校正 –方差的校正因子。

trans-unit.source: correction (None or tuple) – If None, then the effect size is the chisquare statistic divide by the number of observations. If the correction is a tuple (nobs, df), then the effectsize is corrected to have less bias and a smaller variance. However, the correction can make the effectsize negative. In that case, the effectsize is set to zero. Pederson and Johnson (1990) as referenced in McLaren et all. (1994)
trans-unit.target: 校正（无或元组）–如果为无，则效果大小为卡方统计量除以观察数。如果校正是元组（nobs，df），则将效果大小校正为具有较小的偏差和较小的方差。但是，校正可能会使效果变为负面。在这种情况下，效果大小设置为零。McLaren等人引用的Pederson和Johnson（1990）。（1994）

trans-unit.source: correction (bool) – Following the SAS manual, for samplesize below 50, the test statistic is corrected by 0.5. This can be turned off with correction=False, and was included to match R, tseries, which does not use any correction.
trans-unit.target: 校正（布尔）–按照SAS手册，对于小于50的样本量，测试统计量将校正0.5。可以使用correction = False将其关闭，并包含在其中以匹配不使用任何校正的R，tseries。

trans-unit.source: correction (bool) – If true, then a continuity correction is used for the chisquare distribution (if exact is false.)
trans-unit.target: 校正（bool）–如果为true，则将连续性校正用于卡方分布（如果精确为false。）

trans-unit.source: correction (boolean) – If True, use the continuity correction when calculating the test statistic.
trans-unit.target: Correction（boolean）–如果为True，则在计算测试统计量时使用连续性校正。

trans-unit.source: count (bool, optional) – If False, treats count variables (if present) as continuous. This is the default. Else if True, the marginal effect is the change in probabilities when each observation is increased by one.
trans-unit.target: count（bool ，可选）–如果为False，则将count变量（如果存在）视为连续的。这是默认值。如果为True，则边际效应是每个观察值增加一时概率的变化。

trans-unit.source: count (int or array_array_like) – number of successes, can be pandas Series or DataFrame
trans-unit.target: count（int 或array_array_like）–成功次数，可以是Pandas Series或DataFrame

trans-unit.source: count (integer or array_like) – the number of successes in nobs trials.
trans-unit.target: count（integer 或array_like）– Nobs试用的成功次数。

trans-unit.source: count (integer or array_like) – the number of successes in nobs trials. If this is array_like, then the assumption is that this represents the number of successes for each independent sample
trans-unit.target: count（integer 或array_like）– Nobs试用的成功次数。如果是array_like，则假设此值代表每个独立样本的成功次数

trans-unit.source: counts (array_like of int, 1-D) – Number of observations in each category.
trans-unit.target: counts（int的array_like ，1-D）–每个类别中观察值的数量。

trans-unit.source: cov
trans-unit.target: cov

trans-unit.source: cov – HAC robust covariance matrix for parameter estimates
trans-unit.target: cov –用于参数估计的HAC鲁棒协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov – covariance matrix
trans-unit.target: cov –协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov – covariance matrix of the parameter estimates or of linear combination of parameter estimates. See Notes.
trans-unit.target: cov –参数估算值或参数估算值的线性组合的协方差矩阵。请参阅注释。

trans-unit.source: cov – heteroscedasticity robust covariance matrix for parameter estimates
trans-unit.target: cov –参数估计的异方差稳健协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov (array-like) – The input array, must be square but need not be positive semidefinite
trans-unit.target: cov（类似数组）–输入数组，必须为正方形，但不必为正半定

trans-unit.source: cov (array_like, 2d) – covariance matrix, see Notes
trans-unit.target: cov（array_like ，2d）–协方差矩阵，请参见注释

trans-unit.source: cov (array_like, 2d) – specifies covariance matrix
trans-unit.target: cov（array_like ，2d）–指定协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov (array_like, square) – covariance matrix
trans-unit.target: cov（array_like ，square）–协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov (ndarray, (k,k)) – initial covariance matrix
trans-unit.target: cov（ndarray ，（k ，k ））–初始协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov (string, optional) – ‘H1’, ‘H2’, or ‘H3’ Indicates how the covariance matrix is estimated. Default is ‘H1’. See rlm.RLMResults for more information.
trans-unit.target: cov（字符串，可选）–'H1'，'H2'或'H3'指示如何估计协方差矩阵。默认值为“ H1”。有关更多信息，请参见rlm.RLMResults。

trans-unit.source: cov_0 (ndarray, (k_vars, k_vars)) – cluster robust covariance matrix for parameter estimates for first cluster
trans-unit.target: cov_0（ndarray，（k_vars，k_vars））–用于第一个聚类的参数估计的聚类鲁棒协方差矩阵

trans-unit.target: cov_1（ndarray，（k_vars，k_vars））–用于第二簇的参数估计的簇鲁棒协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov_ (ndarray) – corrected covariance matrix
trans-unit.target: cov_（ndarray）–校正后的协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov_both (ndarray, (k_vars, k_vars)) – cluster robust covariance matrix for parameter estimates, for both clusters
trans-unit.target: cov_both（ndarray，（k_vars，k_vars））–两个聚类的参数估计的聚类鲁棒协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov_kwds (dict or None, optional) –
trans-unit.target: cov_kwds（字典或无，可选）–

trans-unit.source: cov_kwds (dict or None, optional) – Keywords for alternative covariance estimators
trans-unit.target: cov_kwds（字典或无，可选）–替代协方差估计量的关键字

trans-unit.source: cov_kwds (dict or None, optional) – See MLEResults.get_robustcov_results for a description required keywords for alternative covariance estimators
trans-unit.target: cov_kwds（字典或None （可选））–有关替代协方差估计量的描述，请参见 MLEResults.get_robustcov_results 以获取描述。

trans-unit.source: cov_kwds (dict or None, optional) – See fit for a description of required keywords for alternative covariance estimators
trans-unit.target: cov_kwds（dict 或None ，可选）–有关 fit 的替代协方差估计量的必需关键字的说明，请参见适合

trans-unit.source: cov_kwds (dict-like) – Extra arguments for calculating the covariance of the parameter estimates.
trans-unit.target: cov_kwds（dict-like）–用于计算参数估计值协方差的额外参数。

trans-unit.source: cov_kwds (list or None, optional) – See linear_model.RegressionResults.get_robustcov_results for a description required keywords for alternative covariance estimators
trans-unit.target: cov_kwds（列表或None ，可选）–有关说明，请参见 linear_model.RegressionResults.get_robustcov_results 以获取替代协方差估计量的必需关键字

trans-unit.source: cov_naive (ndarray) – covariance of the parameter estimates that is not robust to correlation or variance misspecification
trans-unit.target: cov_naive（ndarray）–参数估计的协方差，对相关性或方差错误指定不可靠

trans-unit.source: cov_p (array-like, optional) – An alternative estimate for the parameter covariance matrix. If None is given, self.normalized_cov_params is used.
trans-unit.target: cov_p（类似数组，可选）–参数协方差矩阵的替代估计。如果未指定，则使用self.normalized_cov_params。

trans-unit.source: cov_params (array-like) – The covariance matrix of the estimated params vector, used to obtain prediction errors if pred_type=’lhr’, otherwise optional.
trans-unit.target: cov_params（类似数组）–估计的 params 向量的协方差矩阵，如果pred_type ='lhr'，则用于获取预测误差，否则为可选。

trans-unit.source: cov_params (ndarray (d x d)) – Covariance matrix of the parameters. The number of rows and columns, d (used in the dimension specification of this argument), is equal to neqs * (neqs+num_det_coef_coint + neqs*(k_ar-1)+number of deterministic dummy variables outside the cointegration relation). For the case with no deterministic terms this matrix is defined on p. 287 in [1] as \(\Sigma_{co}\) and its relationship to the ML-estimators can be seen in eq. (7.2.21) on p. 296 in [1].
trans-unit.target: cov_params（ndarray（dxd））–参数的协方差矩阵。行和列的数量d（在此参数的尺寸说明中使用）等于neqs *（neqs + num_det_coef_coint + neqs *（k_ar-1）+协整关系之外的确定性虚拟变量的数量）。对于没有确定项的情况，此矩阵定义在p上。[1]中的 287 为\（\ Sigma_ {co} \），其与ML估计量的关系可以在等式中看到。（7.2.21）在第 296在[1]中。

trans-unit.source: cov_params_default (ndarray) – default covariance of the parameter estimates. Is chosen among one of the following three based on cov_type
trans-unit.target: cov_params_default（ndarray）–参数估计值的默认协方差。基于 cov_type 从以下三个之一中选择

trans-unit.source: cov_params_wo_det (ndarray) – Covariance matrix of the parameters \(\tilde{\Pi}, \tilde{\Gamma}\) where \(\tilde{\Pi} = \tilde{\alpha} \tilde{\beta'}\). Equals cov_params without the rows and columns related to deterministic terms. This matrix is defined as \(\Sigma_{co}\) on p. 287 in [1].
trans-unit.target: cov_params_wo_det（ndarray）–参数\（\ tilde {\ Pi}，\ tilde {\ Gamma} \）的协方差矩阵，其中\（\ tilde {\ Pi} = \ tilde {\ alpha} \ tilde {\ beta'} \）。等于 cov_params ,而没有与确定性术语相关的行和列。该矩阵在p上定义为\（\ Sigma_ {co} \）。287 [1]。

trans-unit.source: cov_pen (CovariancePenalty object) – A penalty for the random effects covariance matrix
trans-unit.target: cov_pen（CovariancePenalty对象）–随机效应协方差矩阵的惩罚

trans-unit.source: cov_re (2d array-like) – Estimate of the random effects covariance matrix
trans-unit.target: cov_re（2d array-like）–随机效应协方差矩阵的估计

trans-unit.source: cov_re (array-like) – The covariance matrix of the random effects.
trans-unit.target: cov_re（类似数组）–随机效应的协方差矩阵。

trans-unit.source: cov_re (array) – The fitted random-effects covariance matrix
trans-unit.target: cov_re（array）–拟合的随机效应协方差矩阵

trans-unit.source: cov_robust (ndarray) – covariance of the parameter estimates that is robust
trans-unit.target: cov_robust（ndarray）–健壮的参数估计的协方差

trans-unit.source: cov_robust_bc (ndarray) – covariance of the parameter estimates that is robust and bias reduced
trans-unit.target: cov_robust_bc（ndarray）–参数估计的协方差，鲁棒且偏置减少

trans-unit.source: cov_struct (CovStruct class instance) – The default is Independence. To specify an exchangeable structure use cov_struct = Exchangeable(). See statsmodels.genmod.cov_struct.CovStruct for more information.
trans-unit.target: cov_struct（CovStruct类实例）–默认为独立。要指定可交换结构，请使用cov_struct = Exchangeable（）。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.genmod.cov_struct.CovStruct。

trans-unit.target: cov_type（str ，可选）–有关结果对象的协方差矩阵类型的描述，请参见 MLEResults.fit 。

trans-unit.source: cov_type (str, optional) – See fit for a description of covariance matrix types for results object.
trans-unit.target: cov_type（str ，可选）–有关 fit 结果对象协方差矩阵类型的描述，请参见“ 适合 ”。

trans-unit.source: cov_type (str, optional) – See regression.linear_model.RegressionResults for a description of the available covariance estimators
trans-unit.target: cov_type（STR ，可选） -见 regression.linear_model.RegressionResults 用于可用协方差估计的说明

trans-unit.source: cov_type (str, optional) – The type of covariance matrix estimator to use. Can be one of ‘approx’, ‘opg’, ‘robust’, or ‘none’. Default is ‘approx’.
trans-unit.target: cov_type（str ，optional）–要使用的协方差矩阵估计器的类型。可以是“大约”，“ opg”，“健壮”或“无”之一。默认值为“大约”。

trans-unit.source: cov_type (string) – One of “robust”, “naive”, or “bias_reduced”.
trans-unit.target: cov_type（字符串）–“健壮”，“天真”或“ bias_reduced”之一。

trans-unit.source: cov_type (string) – One of “robust”, “naive”, or “bias_reduced”. Determines the covariance used to compute standard errors. Defaults to “robust”.
trans-unit.target: cov_type（字符串）–“健壮”，“天真”或“ bias_reduced”之一。确定用于计算标准误差的协方差。默认为“健壮”。

trans-unit.source: cov_type (string) – The covariance type used for computing standard errors; must be one of ‘robust’, ‘naive’, and ‘bias reduced’. See GEE for details.
trans-unit.target: cov_type（字符串）–用于计算标准错误的协方差类型；必须是“健壮”，“天真”和“减少偏见”之一。有关详细信息，请参见 GEE 。

trans-unit.source: cov_type (string) – The covariance type used to compute the standard errors; one of ‘robust’ (the usual robust sandwich-type covariance estimate), ‘naive’ (ignores dependence), and ‘bias reduced’ (the Mancl/DeRouen estimate).
trans-unit.target: cov_type（字符串）–用于计算标准误差的协方差类型；“稳健”（通常的稳健三明治式协方差估计），“朴素”（忽略依赖）和“偏倚减少”（Mancl / DeRouen估计）之一。

trans-unit.source: cov_type (string) – The type of parameter estimate covariance matrix to compute.
trans-unit.target: cov_type（字符串）–要计算的参数估计协方差矩阵的类型。

trans-unit.source: cov_type (string) – string indicating whether a “robust”, “naive” or “bias_reduced” covariance is used as default
trans-unit.target: cov_type（string）–表示默认使用“稳健”，“天真”还是“ bias_reduced”协方差的字符串

trans-unit.source: cov_type (string) – the type of robust sandwich estimator to use. see Notes below
trans-unit.target: cov_type（字符串）–要使用的鲁棒三明治估计量的类型。请参阅下面的注释

trans-unit.source: cov_var_repr (ndarray (neqs**2 * k_ar x neqs**2 * k_ar)) – This matrix is called \(\Sigma^{co}_{\alpha}\) on p. 289 in [1]. It is needed e.g. for impulse-response-analysis.
trans-unit.target: cov_var_repr（ndarray（neqs ** 2 * k_ar x neqs ** 2 * k_ar））–在p上将此矩阵称为\（\ Sigma ^ {co} _ {\ alpha} \）。289 in [1]。例如，对于冲激响应分析，它是必需的。

trans-unit.source: crit (structured array) – critical values at alpha=0.95 for different nvars
trans-unit.target: 暴击（结构化数组）–对于不同的nvar，临界值在alpha = 0.95

trans-unit.source: crit_vals (array-like (rank +1 if rank < neqs else rank)) – A one-dimensional array-like object containing the critical values corresponding to the entries in the test_stats argument.
trans-unit.target: crit_vals（阵列状（ rank 1如果 rank < neqs 其他 rank ）） -的一维阵列状的含有对应于在所述条目中的临界值对象 test_stats 参数。

trans-unit.source: crit_value (dict) – Critical values for the test statistic at the 1 %, 5 %, and 10 % levels based on regression curve. This depends on the number of observations.

trans-unit.source: crit_value (float) –
trans-unit.target: crit_value（float）–

trans-unit.target: crit_value（float）–测试的临界值。

trans-unit.source: criteria ({'aic', 'bic', 'hqic'}) – The information criteria to compute.
trans-unit.target: 标准（{'aic' ，'bic' ，'hqic'}）–要计算的信息标准。

trans-unit.source: criterion (str {'DFFITS', 'Cooks'}) – Which criterion to base the size of the points on. Options are DFFITS or Cook’s D.
trans-unit.target: 准则（str {'DFFITS' ，'Cooks'}）–哪个准则作为点的大小依据。选项为DFFITS或Cook'sD。

trans-unit.source: critical values (dict) – Critical values for the test statistic at the 1 %, 5 %, and 10 % levels. Based on MacKinnon (2010)
trans-unit.target: 临界值（dict）– 1％，5％和10％级别的测试统计量的临界值。基于MacKinnon（2010）

trans-unit.source: critval_continuity (bool or float) – If this is non-zero, then the critical values of the tost rejection region are adjusted before converting to integers. This affects both distributions, dist='norm' and dist='binom'.
trans-unit.target: critval_continuity（bool 或float）–如果该值不为零，则在转换为整数之前会调整tost拒绝区域的临界值。这会影响 dist='norm' 和 dist='binom' 两种分布。

trans-unit.source: csv – concatenated summary tables in comma delimited format
trans-unit.target: csv –逗号分隔格式的串联汇总表

trans-unit.source: ctol (positive real) – Convergence criterion.

trans-unit.target: 累积（布尔值，可选）–指示是绘制特征值还是累积特征值的标志

trans-unit.source: cut (float) – Defines the length of the grid past the lowest and highest values of X so that the kernel goes to zero. The end points are -/+ cut*bw*{min(X) or max(X)}
trans-unit.target: cut（float）–定义超过X的最小值和最大值的网格长度，以使内核变为零。端点为-/ + cut * bw * {min（X）或max（X）}

trans-unit.source: cutoff (None or float in [0, 1]) – If cutoff is not None, then the return only includes observations with multiple testing corrected p-values strictly below the cutoff. The returned array or dataframe can be empty if t
trans-unit.target: 截止（无或在浮子[ 0 ，1 ]） -如果截止不是无，则返回仅包括具有多个测试观测校正严格低于截止p-值。如果t，则返回的数组或数据框可以为空

trans-unit.source: cutoff ({'mean', 'median'} or number) – This specifies the cutoff to split the data into large and small values.
trans-unit.target: 截断值（{'mean' ，'median'} 或number）–这指定截断值以将数据分为大值和小值。

trans-unit.target: cycle（数组）–给定羔羊数据中的估计周期。

trans-unit.source: cycle (array) – The features of X between periodicities given by low and high
trans-unit.target: 周期（数组）– 低和高给定的周期性之间的 X 特征

trans-unit.source: cycle (bool, optional) – Whether or not to include a cycle component. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: cycle（bool ，可选）–是否包括循环组件。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: cycle (boolean, optional) – Whether or not to plot the cyclical component, if applicable. Default is True.
trans-unit.target: cycle（布尔值，可选）–是否绘制周期性分量（如果适用）。默认值为True。

trans-unit.source: cycle_period_bounds (tuple, optional) – A tuple with lower and upper allowed bounds for the period of the cycle. If not provided, the following default bounds are used: (1) if no date / time information is provided, the frequency is constrained to be between zero and \(\pi\), so the period is constrained to be in [0.5, infinity]. (2) If the date / time information is provided, the default bounds allow the cyclical component to be between 1.5 and 12 years; depending on the frequency of the endogenous variable, this will imply different specific bounds.
trans-unit.target: cycle_period_bounds（tuple ，optional）–一个在周期内允许上下限的元组。如果未提供，则使用以下默认范围：（1）如果未提供日期/时间信息，则频率被限制在零和\（\ pi \）之间，因此周期被限制在[0.5，无限]。（2）如果提供了日期/时间信息，则默认范围允许周期性成分在1.5至12年之间；取决于内生变量的频率，这将暗示不同的特定范围。

trans-unit.source: data (dict, pandas.Series, np.ndarray, pandas.DataFrame) – The contingency table that contains the data. Each category should contain a non-negative number with a tuple as index. It expects that all the combination of keys to be representes; if that is not true, will automatically consider the missing values as 0. The order of the keys will be the same as the one of insertion. If a dict of a Series (or any other dict like object) is used, it will take the keys as labels. If a np.ndarray is provided, it will generate a simple numerical labels.
trans-unit.target: 数据（dict ，pandas.Series ，np.ndarray ，pandas.DataFrame）–包含数据的列联表。每个类别应包含一个以元组为索引的非负数。它期望键的所有组合都可以表示；如果不正确，将自动将丢失的值视为0。键的顺序将与插入顺序相同。如果使用了系列的字典（或其他类似对象的字典），它将把键作为标签。如果提供了np.ndarray，它将生成一个简单的数字标签。

trans-unit.source: data (dict, pandas.Series, np.ndarray, pandas.DataFrame) – The contingency table that contains the data. Each category should contain a non-negative number with a tuple as index. It expects that all the combination of keys to be representes; if that is not true, will automatically consider the missing values as 0. The order of the keys will be the same as the one of insertion. If a dict of a Series (or any other dict like object) is used, it will take the keys as labels. If a np.ndarray is provided, it will generate a simple numerical labels.
trans-unit.target: 数据（dict ，pandas.Series ，np.ndarray ，pandas.DataFrame）–包含数据的列联表。每个类别应包含一个以元组为索引的非负数。它期望所有键组合都可以表示；如果不正确，将自动将丢失的值视为0。键的顺序将与插入顺序相同。如果使用了系列的字典（或其他类似对象的字典），它将键作为标签。如果提供了np.ndarray，它将生成一个简单的数字标签。

trans-unit.target: data（ndarray 或2-D ndarray的列表）–内核密度估计的训练数据，用于确定带宽。如果是二维数组，则应为形状（num_observations，num_variables）。如果是列表，则每个列表元素都是一个单独的观察值。

trans-unit.source: data (ndarray) – The vectors of functions to create a functional boxplot from. The first axis is the function index, the second axis the one along which the function is defined. So data[0, :] is the first functional curve.

The first axis is the function index, the second axis the one along which the function is defined. So data[0, :] is the first functional curve.

trans-unit.source: ddof (int) – Not Implemented Yet If the residuals are from a regression, or ARMA estimation, then there are recommendations to correct the degrees of freedom by the number of parameters that have been estimated, for example ddof=p+a for an ARMA(p,q) (need reference, based on discussion on R finance mailinglist)
trans-unit.target: ddof（int）–尚未实现如果残差来自回归或ARMA估计，则建议根据已估计的参数数量来校正自由度，例如ARMA的ddof = p + a （p，q）（需要参考，基于有关R财务邮件列表的讨论）

trans-unit.source: ddof (int) – default ddof=0, degrees of freedom correction used for second moments, var, std, cov, corrcoef. However, statistical tests are independent of ddof, based on the standard formulas.
trans-unit.target: ddof（int）–默认ddof = 0，用于第二时刻的自由度校正，var，std，cov，corrcoef。但是，基于标准公式，统计检验与 ddof 无关。

trans-unit.source: ddof_scale (scalar or None) – The scale parameter is estimated as the sum of squared Pearson residuals divided by N - ddof_scale, where N is the total sample size. If ddof_scale is None, the number of covariates (including an intercept if present) is used.
trans-unit.target: ddof_scale（标量或无）–标度参数估计为皮尔逊残差平方的总和除以 N - ddof_scale ，其中N是样本总数。如果 ddof_scale 为None，则使用协变量的数量（包括截距（如果存在））。

trans-unit.source: decimals (None or int) – If None, then pandas default precision applies. Otherwise values are rounded to the specified decimals. If style is ‘display’, then the underlying dataframe is not changed. If style is ‘strings’, then values are rounded before conversion to strings.

If discrete is false, then the TOST critical values are used as floating point numbers, and the power is calculated based on the rejection region that is not discretized.

trans-unit.target: disp（int ，optional）–如果为True，则打印收敛信息。对于默认的l_bfgs_b解算器，disp控制迭代过程中输出的频率。disp <0表示在这种情况下不输出。

trans-unit.source: dist (A scipy.stats or statsmodels distribution) – Compare x against dist. The default is scipy.stats.distributions.norm (a standard normal).
trans-unit.target: dist（scipy.stats 或statsmodels分布）–将x与dist比较。默认值为scipy.stats.distributions.norm（标准标准）。

trans-unit.source: dist (scipy.stats.distribution) – A scipy.stats distribution, needed if line is ‘q’.
trans-unit.target: dist（scipy.stats.distribution）–如果line为'q'，则需要scipy.stats分配。

trans-unit.source: dist (string in ['norm', 'binom']) – This defines the distribution to evalute the power of the test. The critical values of the TOST test are always based on the normal approximation, but the distribution for the power can be either the normal (default) or the binomial (exact) distribution.
trans-unit.target: dist（[ 'norm' ，'binom' ]中的字符串）–定义评估测试功效的分布。TOST测试的临界值始终基于正态近似，但功效的分布可以是正态（默认）或二项式（精确）分布。

trans-unit.source: dist ({'norm', 'exp'}, optional) – Distribution to test in set.
trans-unit.target: dist（{'norm' ，'exp'} ，可选）–分发以测试集中。

trans-unit.source: dist_class (class) – A random number generator class. Must take ‘loc’ and ‘scale’ as arguments and return a random number generator implementing an rvs method for simulating random values. Defaults to Gaussian.
trans-unit.target: dist_class（class）–随机数生成器类。必须以“ loc”和“ scale”作为参数，并返回实现了用于模拟随机值的 rvs 方法的随机数生成器。默认为高斯。

trans-unit.source: dist_func (function from R^k x R^k to R^+, optional) – A function that computes the distance between the two observations based on their time values.
trans-unit.target: dist_func（从R ^ kx R ^ k到R ^ +的函数，可选）–根据两个观测值的 time 值计算两个观测值之间的距离的函数。

trans-unit.source: dist_high (float) – The distance above the MLE of the parameter of interest to begin calculating points on the profile likelihood.
trans-unit.target: dist_high（float）–要开始计算轮廓似然上的点的感兴趣参数的MLE上方的距离。

trans-unit.source: dist_low (float) – The distance below the MLE of the parameter of interest to begin calculating points on the profile likelihood.
trans-unit.target: dist_low（float）–要在轮廓似然上计算点的感兴趣参数的MLE下方的距离。

trans-unit.source: distance (scalar, optional) – if epsilon is omitted, specifies the distance multiplier to use when computing it
trans-unit.target: distance（标量，可选）–如果省略epsilon，则指定在计算时要使用的距离倍数

trans-unit.source: distargs (tuple) – A tuple of arguments passed to dist to specify it fully so dist.ppf may be called.
trans-unit.target: distargs（tuple）–传递给dist的参数元组，以完全指定它，因此可以调用dist.ppf。

trans-unit.source: distname (string) – name of distribution function
trans-unit.target: distname（字符串）–分发函数的名称

trans-unit.source: distributed (bool) – If True, the model uses distributed methods for fitting, will raise an error if True and partitions is None.
trans-unit.target: 分布式（bool）–如果为True，则模型使用分布式方法进行拟合，如果True并且partitions为None，则将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: distrvs (function, random number generator) – function that generates the random numbers, and takes sample size as argument default: np.random.randn TODO: change to size argument
trans-unit.target: distrvs（函数，随机数生成器）–生成随机数并以样本大小作为参数默认值的函数：np.random.randn TODO：更改为大小参数

trans-unit.source: do_cg (boolean, defaults to True) – If False, the optimization is skipped and a results object at the given (or default) starting values is returned.
trans-unit.target: do_cg（boolean ，默认为True）–如果为False，则跳过优化，并返回给定（或默认）起始值的结果对象。

trans-unit.source: drift (bool) – Whether or not to remove a trend from the data. The trend is estimated as np.arange(nobs)*(X[-1] - X[0])/(len(X)-1)
trans-unit.target: 漂移（布尔）–是否从数据中删除趋势。趋势估计为np.arange（nobs）*（X [-1]-X [0]）/（len（X）-1）

trans-unit.source: drop (None, float or int) – If this is not None, then observation are dropped from the middle part of the sorted series. If 0<split<1 then split is interpreted as fraction of the number of observations to be dropped. Note: Currently, observations are dropped between split and split+drop, where split and drop are the indices (given by rounding if specified as fraction). The first sample is [0:split], the second sample is [split+drop:]
trans-unit.target: drop（None ，float 或int）–如果不是None，则从已排序序列的中间部分删除观察值。如果0 <split <1，则将split解释为要删除的观察数的一部分。注意：当前，观测值在split和split + drop之间删除，其中split和drop是索引（如果指定为分数，则四舍五入）。第一个样本为[0：split]，第二个样本为[split + drop：]

trans-unit.source: drop (bool) – Whether or not keep the categorical variable in the returned matrix.
trans-unit.target: drop（bool）–是否将分类变量保留在返回的矩阵中。

trans-unit.source: drop_cols (array-like) – Columns to drop from the design matrix. Cannot be used to drop terms involving categoricals.
trans-unit.target: drop_cols（类似于数组）–从设计矩阵中删除的列。不能用于删除涉及分类的术语。

trans-unit.source: dropex (int (default is 0)) – exclude first dropex lags from other variables for all variables, except the first, lags from dropex to maxlagex are included
trans-unit.target: dropex（int （默认为0 ））–对于所有变量，从其他变量中排除第一个dropex滞后，除了第一个，包括从dropex到maxlagex的滞后

trans-unit.source: dtype (np.dtype, optional) – If an endogenous vector is not given (i.e. k_endog is an integer), the default datatype of the state space matrices can optionally be specified. Default is np.float64.
trans-unit.target: D型（np.dtype ，可选） -如果内源矢量未给出（即 k_endog 是整数），可以任选地指定的状态空间矩阵的缺省数据类型。默认值为 np.float64 。

trans-unit.source: dummy (bool, optional) – If False, treats binary variables (if present) as continuous. This is the default. Else if True, treats binary variables as changing from 0 to 1. Note that any variable that is either 0 or 1 is treated as binary. Each binary variable is treated separately for now.
trans-unit.target: dummy（布尔值，可选）–如果为False，则将二进制变量（如果存在）视为连续变量。这是默认值。否则，如果为True，则将二进制变量视为从0变为1。请注意，任何0或1的变量都被视为二进制。目前，每个二进制变量都将单独处理。

trans-unit.source: dw (float, array-like)
trans-unit.target: dw（浮点型）

trans-unit.source: dynamic (bool) – The dynamic keyword affects in-sample prediction. If dynamic is False, then the in-sample lagged values are used for prediction. If dynamic is True, then in-sample forecasts are used in place of lagged dependent variables. The first forecasted
trans-unit.target: dynamic（bool）– dynamic 关键字会影响样本内预测。如果dynamic为False，则将样本中的滞后值用于预测。如果 dynamic 为True，则使用样本内预测代替滞后因变量。第一次预测

trans-unit.source: dynamic (bool) – The dynamic keyword affects in-sample prediction. If dynamic is False, then the in-sample lagged values are used for prediction. If dynamic is True, then in-sample forecasts are used in place of lagged dependent variables. The first forecasted value is start.
trans-unit.target: dynamic（bool）– dynamic 关键字会影响样本内预测。如果dynamic为False，则将样本中的滞后值用于预测。如果 dynamic 为True，则使用样本内预测代替滞后因变量。第一个预测值是 start 。

trans-unit.source: dynamic (bool, optional) – The dynamic keyword affects in-sample prediction. If dynamic is False, then the in-sample lagged values are used for prediction. If dynamic is True, then in-sample forecasts are used in place of lagged dependent variables. The first forecasted value is start.
trans-unit.target: dynamic（bool ，可选）– dynamic 关键字会影响样本内预测。如果dynamic为False，则将样本中的滞后值用于预测。如果 dynamic 为True，则使用样本内预测代替滞后因变量。第一个预测值是 start 。

trans-unit.source: dynamic (boolean, int, str, or datetime, optional) – Integer offset relative to start at which to begin dynamic prediction. Can also be an absolute date string to parse or a datetime type (these are not interpreted as offsets). Prior to this observation, true endogenous values will be used for prediction; starting with this observation and continuing through the end of prediction, forecasted endogenous values will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: dynamic（boolean ，int ，str 或datetime ，可选）–相对于开始动态预测的 start 位置的整数偏移量。也可以是要解析的绝对日期字符串或datetime类型（这些不解释为偏移量）。在进行此观察之前，将使用真实的内生值进行预测。从此观察开始，一直到预测结束，将使用预测的内生值代替。

trans-unit.source: dynamic (int, optional) – Offset relative to start at which to begin dynamic prediction. Prior to this observation, true endogenous values will be used for prediction; starting with this observation and continuing through the end of prediction, forecasted endogenous values will be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 动态（int ，可选）–相对于开始动态预测的 start 位置的偏移量。在进行此观察之前，将使用真实的内生值进行预测。从此观察开始，一直到预测结束，将使用预测的内生值代替。

trans-unit.source: e (Iterable) – Expected values
trans-unit.target: e（可迭代）–期望值

trans-unit.source: effect_size (float) – standardized effect size, according to Cohen’s definition. see statsmodels.stats.gof.chisquare_effectsize
trans-unit.target: effect_size（float）–根据Cohen的定义，标准化的效果大小。参见 statsmodels.stats.gof.chisquare_effectsize

trans-unit.source: effect_size (float) – standardized effect size, difference between the two means divided by the standard deviation. effect_size has to be positive.
trans-unit.target: effect_size（float）–标准化效果大小，两种均值之差除以标准差。 effect_size 必须为正。

trans-unit.source: effect_size (float) – standardized effect size, difference between the two means divided by the standard deviation. If ratio=0, then this is the standardized mean in the one sample test.
trans-unit.target: effect_size（float）–标准化效果大小，两种均值之差除以标准差。如果ratio = 0，则这是一个样本测试中的标准化平均值。

trans-unit.source: effect_size (float) – standardized effect size, difference between the two means divided by the standard deviation. effect size has to be positive.
trans-unit.target: effect_size（float）–标准化效果大小，两种均值之差除以标准差。效果大小必须为正。

trans-unit.source: effect_size (float) – standardized effect size, mean divided by the standard deviation. effect size has to be positive.
trans-unit.target: effect_size（float）–标准化效果大小，均值除以标准差。效果大小必须为正。

trans-unit.source: effect_size (scalar or array_like) – specifies the values of the effect_size in the plot
trans-unit.target: effect_size（标量或array_like）–指定绘图中effect_size的值

trans-unit.source: effects – the marginal effect corresponding to the input options
trans-unit.target: 效果 –对应于输入选项的边际效果

trans-unit.source: effectsize – effect size of chisquare test
trans-unit.target: effectsize –卡方检验的效应量

trans-unit.source: efficient (bool, optional) – If True, the bandwidth estimation is to be performed efficiently – by taking smaller sub-samples and estimating the scaling factor of each subsample. This is useful for large samples (nobs >> 300) and/or multiple variables (k_vars > 3). If False (default), all data is used at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 高效（布尔型，可选）–如果为True，则通过获取较小的子样本并估计每个子样本的比例因子，可以有效地执行带宽估计。这对于大样本（nobs >> 300）和/或多个变量（k_vars> 3）很有用。如果为False（默认），则同时使用所有数据。

trans-unit.source: ekr – Contains the expected values of the 4 robust kurtosis measures
trans-unit.target: ekr –包含4种强有力的峰度测度的期望值

trans-unit.source: ell_kwds (dict, optional) – UNUSED
trans-unit.target: ell_kwds（字典，可选）–未使用

trans-unit.source: em_iter (int) – The number of EM iterations before starting gradient optimization, only used for ML estimation.
trans-unit.target: em_iter（int）–开始梯度优化之前的EM迭代次数，仅用于ML估计。

trans-unit.source: em_iter (int, optional) – Number of initial EM iteration steps used to improve starting parameters.
trans-unit.target: em_iter（int ，optional）–用于改善启动参数的初始EM迭代步骤数。

trans-unit.source: encoding (str) – Default is latin-1. Note that Stata does not support unicode.
trans-unit.target: encoding（str）–默认为latin-1。请注意，Stata不支持unicode。

trans-unit.source: encoding (string, optional) – Used for Python 3 only. Encoding to use when reading the .dta file. Defaults to locale.getpreferredencoding
trans-unit.target: 编码（字符串，可选）–仅用于Python 3。读取.dta文件时使用的编码。默认为 locale.getpreferredencoding

trans-unit.source: end (int) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to end forecasting, i.e., the last forecast will be at end.
trans-unit.target: end（int）–结束预测的零索引观测值，即最后一个预测将在此结束。

trans-unit.source: end (int, optional) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to end forecasting, i.e., the last forecast will be at end.
trans-unit.target: end（int ，可选）–结束预测的零索引观测值，即最后一个预测将在此结束。

trans-unit.source: end (int, str, or datetime) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to end forecasting, ie., the first forecast is start. Can also be a date string to parse or a datetime type.
trans-unit.target: end（int ，str 或datetime）–零索引的观察编号，在该位置结束预测，即，第一个预测开始。也可以是要解析的日期字符串或datetime类型。

trans-unit.source: end (int, str, or datetime) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to end forecasting, ie., the first forecast is start. Can also be a date string to parse or a datetime type. However, if the dates index does not have a fixed frequency, end must be an integer index if you want out of sample prediction.
trans-unit.target: end（int ，str 或datetime）–零索引的观察编号，在该位置结束预测，即，第一个预测开始。也可以是要解析的日期字符串或datetime类型。但是，如果日期索引没有固定的频率，则如果要退出样本预测，则end必须为整数索引。

trans-unit.source: end (int, str, or datetime, optional) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to end forecasting, i.e., the last forecast is end. Can also be a date string to parse or a datetime type. However, if the dates index does not have a fixed frequency, end must be an integer index if you want out of sample prediction. Default is the last observation in the sample.
trans-unit.target: end（int ，str 或datetime ，可选）–结束预测的零索引观测值，即最后一个预测结束。也可以是要解析的日期字符串或datetime类型。但是，如果日期索引没有固定的频率，则如果要退出样本预测，则end必须为整数索引。默认值是样本中的最后一个观察值。

trans-unit.source: end (int, str, or datetime, optional) – Zero-indexed observation number at which to end forecasting, ie., the first forecast is start. Can also be a date string to parse or a datetime type. However, if the dates index does not have a fixed frequency, end must be an integer index if you want out of sample prediction. Default is the last observation in the sample.
trans-unit.target: end（int ，str 或datetime ，可选）–结束预测的零索引观测值，即，第一个预测开始。也可以是要解析的日期字符串或datetime类型。但是，如果日期索引没有固定的频率，则如果要退出样本预测，则end必须为整数索引。默认值是样本中的最后一个观察值。

trans-unit.source: endog (1-D numpy array) – The y-values of the observed points
trans-unit.target: endog（一维numpy数组）–观测点的y值

trans-unit.source: endog (1d array-like) – The dependent variable
trans-unit.target: endog（1d array-like）–因变量

trans-unit.source: endog (1darray) – Data to be analyzed
trans-unit.target: endog（1darray）–要分析的数据

trans-unit.source: endog (DataFrame) – Observed values of vname.
trans-unit.target: endog（DataFrame）–观察到的 vname 值。

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – 1-d endogenous response variable. The dependent variable.
trans-unit.target: endog（阵列状）–一维内源性响应变量。因变量。

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – 1-d endogenous response variable. The independent variable.
trans-unit.target: endog（阵列状）–一维内源性响应变量。自变量。

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – 1d array of endogenous response variable. This array can be 1d or 2d. Binomial family models accept a 2d array with two columns. If supplied, each observation is expected to be [success, failure].
trans-unit.target: endog（类似数组）–一维内生响应变量数组。该数组可以是1d或2d。二项式族模型接受带有两列的二维数组。如果提供，则每个观察结果均预期为[成功，失败]。

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – 1d array of endogenous values (i.e. responses, outcomes, dependent variables, or ‘Y’ values).
trans-unit.target: endog（类似数组）–一维内生值数组（即响应，结果，因变量或“ Y”值）。

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – 2-d endogenous response variable. The independent variable.
trans-unit.target: endog（阵列状）– 二维内源性响应变量。自变量。

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – endog is an 1-d vector of the endogenous response. endog can contain strings, ints, or floats. Note that if it contains strings, every distinct string will be a category. No stripping of whitespace is done.
trans-unit.target: endog（阵列状）– endog 是内源性应答的一维向量。 endog 可以包含字符串，整数或浮点数。请注意，如果包含字符串，则每个不同的字符串都是一个类别。不会剥离空格。

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – Duration (time) values at which the predictions are made. Only used if pred_type is either ‘cumhaz’ or ‘surv’. If using model exog, defaults to model endog (time), but may be provided explicitly to make predictions at alternative times.
trans-unit.target: endog（类似数组）–进行预测的持续时间（时间）值。仅当pred_type为'cumhaz'或'surv'时使用。如果使用模型 exog ，则默认为模型 endog （时间），但可以显式提供以在其他时间进行预测。

trans-unit.target: endog（类似数组）–回归的因变量

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – The endogenous response variable
trans-unit.target: endog（阵列状）–内源性反应变量

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – The endogenous variable.

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like) – Vector of response values.
trans-unit.target: endog（类似数组）–响应值的向量。

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like (nobs_tot x neqs)) – 2-d endogenous response variable.
trans-unit.target: endog（数组状（nobs_tot x neqs ））– 二维内生响应变量。

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like (nobs_tot x neqs)) – The data with presample.

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like, pandas.Series) – The series to model. It is best to use a pandas object with a DatetimeIndex or PeriodIndex. However, you can pass an array-like object. If your object does not have a dates index then start and freq are not optional.

trans-unit.source: endog (array-like, pandas.Series) – The series to model. It is best to use a pandas object with a DatetimeIndex or PeriodIndex. However, you can pass an array-like object. If your object does not have a dates index then start and freq are not optional.

trans-unit.target: endog_names（str）–内生变量的名称。如果指定，它将代替endg中的列名使用

trans-unit.source: enforce_invertibility (boolean, optional) – Whether or not to transform the MA parameters to enforce invertibility in the moving average component of the model. Default is True.
trans-unit.target: force_invertibility（布尔值，可选）–是否转换MA参数以在模型的移动平均成分中强制实现可逆性。默认值为True。

trans-unit.source: enforce_stationarity (boolean, optional) – Whether or not to transform the AR parameters to enforce stationarity in the autoregressive component of the model. Default is True.
trans-unit.target: force_stationarity（布尔值，可选）–是否转换AR参数以在模型的自回归组件中实现平稳性。默认值为True。

trans-unit.source: epsilon (float) – stepsize for finite difference calculation
trans-unit.target: epsilon（float）–步长用于有限差分计算

trans-unit.source: epsilon (float or array-like, optional) – Stepsize used, if None, then stepsize is automatically chosen according to EPS**(1/3)*x.
trans-unit.target: epsilon（float 或类似数组的数组，可选）–使用的步进大小，如果为None，则根据EPS **（1/3）* x自动选择步进大小。

trans-unit.source: epsilon (float or array-like, optional) – Stepsize used, if None, then stepsize is automatically chosen according to EPS**(1/4)*x.
trans-unit.target: epsilon（float 或类似数组的数组，可选）–使用的步进大小，如果为None，则根据EPS **（1/4）* x自动选择步进大小。

trans-unit.source: epsilon (float, optional) – Stepsize, if None, optimal stepsize is used. Optimal step-size is EPS*x. See note.
trans-unit.target: epsilon（float ，可选）–步长，如果为None，则使用最佳步长。最佳步长为EPS * x。见说明。

trans-unit.source: epsilon (float, optional) – Stepsize, if None, optimal stepsize is used. This is EPS**(1/2)*x for centered == False and EPS**(1/3)*x for centered == True.
trans-unit.target: epsilon（float ，可选）–步长，如果为None，则使用最佳步长。这是EPS **（1/2）* X为 centered == False，并且EPS **（1/3）* X为 centered == TRUE。

trans-unit.source: epsilon (scalar, optional) – the threshold distance to use in calculating the correlation sum
trans-unit.target: epsilon（标量，可选）–用于计算相关和的阈值距离

trans-unit.source: error_cov_type ({'diagonal', 'unstructured'}, optional) – The structure of the covariance matrix of the error term, where “unstructured” puts no restrictions on the matrix and “diagonal” requires it to be a diagonal matrix (uncorrelated errors). Default is “unstructured”.
trans-unit.target: error_cov_type（{'diagonal' ，'unstructured'} ，可选）–误差项协方差矩阵的结构，其中“非结构化”对矩阵没有限制，“对角线”要求它是对角矩阵（不相关的误差）。默认值为“非结构化”。

trans-unit.source: error_cov_type ({'scalar', 'diagonal', 'unstructured'}, optional) – The structure of the covariance matrix of the observation error term, where “unstructured” puts no restrictions on the matrix, “diagonal” requires it to be any diagonal matrix (uncorrelated errors), and “scalar” requires it to be a scalar times the identity matrix. Default is “diagonal”.
trans-unit.target: error_cov_type（{'scalar' ，'diagonal' ，'unstructured'} ，可选）–观察误差项的协方差矩阵的结构，其中“ unstructured”对矩阵没有限制，“ diagonal”要求它是任意的对角矩阵（无相关误差），“标量”要求它是标量乘以单位矩阵。默认值为“对角线”。

trans-unit.source: error_order (int, optional) – The order of the vector autoregression followed by the observation error component. Default is None, corresponding to white noise errors.
trans-unit.target: error_order（int ，optional）–向量自回归的顺序，后跟观察误差分量。默认值为无，对应于白噪声错误。

trans-unit.source: error_var (boolean, optional) – Whether or not to model the errors jointly via a vector autoregression, rather than as individual autoregressions. Has no effect unless error_order is set. Default is False.
trans-unit.target: error_var（boolean ，optional）–是否通过向量自回归而不是作为单个自回归共同对错误建模。除非设置了 error_order ,否则不起作用。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: error_variance (array) – The variance / covariance matrix of the error term. Should be sized k_endog x k_endog. This is used as input in the algorithm even if is not transformed by it (when transform_variance is False).
trans-unit.target: error_variance（array）–错误项的方差/协方差矩阵。大小应为 k_endog x k_endog 。即使未对其进行转换也将其用作算法中的输入（当 transform_variance 为False时）。

trans-unit.source: error_variance (array) – The variance / covariance matrix of the error term. Should be sized k_endog x k_endog. This is used as input in the algorithm even if is not transformed by it (when transform_variance is False). The error term variance is required input when transformation is used either to force an autoregressive component to be stationary or to force a moving average component to be invertible.
trans-unit.target: error_variance（array）–错误项的方差/协方差矩阵。大小应为 k_endog x k_endog 。即使未对其进行转换也将其用作算法中的输入（当 transform_variance 为False时）。当使用变换将自回归分量设为固定或将移动平均分量设为可逆时，需要输入误差项方差。

trans-unit.source: estimate_mean (bool) – If True, estimate the mean of the distribution. If False, the mean is fixed at zero.
trans-unit.target: Estimate_mean（bool）–如果为True，则估计分布的均值。如果为False，则平均值固定为零。

trans-unit.source: estimate_null_proportion (bool) – If True, estimate the proportion of true null hypotheses (i.e. the proportion of z-scores with expected value zero). If False, this parameter is fixed at 1.
trans-unit.target: Estimate_null_proportion（bool）–如果为True，则估计真实零假设的比例（即，预期值为零的z分数的比例）。如果为False，则此参数固定为1。

trans-unit.source: estimate_scale (bool) – If True, estimate the scale of the distribution. If False, the scale parameter is fixed at 1.

trans-unit.source: exact (bool) – If exact is true, then the binomial distribution will be used. If exact is false, then the chisquare distribution will be used, which is the approximation to the distribution of the test statistic for large sample sizes.
trans-unit.target: 精确（布尔）–如果精确为true，则将使用二项式分布。如果确切为假，则将使用卡方分布，这是大样本量时测试统计量分布的近似值。

trans-unit.target: exog（array_like ，optional）–外源回归数组，形状为点x x。

trans-unit.source: exog (array_like, optional) – Array of exogenous regressors, shaped nobs x k. Default is no exogenous regressors.
trans-unit.target: exog（array_like ，optional）–外源回归数组，形状为点x x。默认为无外源回归。

trans-unit.source: exog (array_like, optional) – If the model includes exogenous regressors, you must provide exactly enough out-of-sample values for the exogenous variables if end is beyond the last observation in the sample.
trans-unit.target: exog（array_like ，optional）–如果模型包含外生回归变量，则如果结束超出样本中的最后观察值，则必须为外生变量提供足够准确的样本外值。

trans-unit.source: exog (list of ndarrays or 2-D ndarray) – The training data for the independent variable; same shape as endog.
trans-unit.target: exog（ndarray 或2-D ndarray的列表）–自变量的训练数据；与 endog 形状相同。

trans-unit.source: exog (list) – The training data for the independent variable(s) Each element in the list is a separate variable
trans-unit.target: exog（list）–自变量的训练数据列表中的每个元素都是一个单独的变量

trans-unit.source: exog (ndarray) – design matrix with all explanatory variables, as for example used in regression
trans-unit.target: exog（ndarray）–具有所有解释变量的设计矩阵，例如用于回归

trans-unit.source: exog (ndarray) – exogenous variables for which linearity is tested
trans-unit.target: exog（ndarray）–测试线性的外生变量

trans-unit.source: exog (ndarray (nobs_tot x neqs) or None) – Deterministic terms outside the cointegration relation.
trans-unit.target: exog（ndarray （nobs_tot x neqs ）或None）–协整关系之外的确定性术语。

trans-unit.source: exog (ndarray (steps x self.exog.shape[1])) – If self.exog is not None, then information about the future values of exog have to be passed via this parameter. The ndarray may be larger in it’s first dimension. In this case only the first steps rows will be considered.
trans-unit.target: exog（ndarray （steps x self.exog.shape [ 1 ] ） –如果self.exog不为None，则必须通过此参数传递有关exog将来值的信息。ndarray的第一个维度可能更大。在这种情况下，将仅考虑第一步行。

trans-unit.source: exog (see Parameters)
trans-unit.target: exog（请参阅参数）

trans-unit.source: exog (ndarray (nobs_tot x neqs) or None) – Deterministic terms outside the cointegration relation.
trans-unit.target: exog（ndarray（nobs_tot x neqs）或 None ）–协整关系之外的确定性术语。

trans-unit.source: exog (ndarray (nobs_tot x neqs) or None, default: None) – Deterministic terms outside the cointegration relation.
trans-unit.target: exog（ndarray（nobs_tot x neqs）或 None ，默认值： None ）–协整关系之外的确定性术语。

trans-unit.source: exog_coefs (ndarray (neqs x exog_coefs.shape[1])) – If deterministic terms outside the cointegration relation are passed via the exog parameter, then exog_coefs contains the corresponding estimated coefficients. As such exog_coefs represents the last columns of det_coef. If no deterministic terms were passed via the exog parameter, this attribute is an ndarray of size zero.
trans-unit.target: exog_coefs（ndarray（neqs x exog_coefs.shape [1]））–如果协整关系之外的确定性项通过 exog 参数传递，则 exog_coefs 将包含相应的估计系数。因此， exog_coefs 代表det_coef的最后 det_coef 列。如果没有通过 exog 参数传递确定性术语，则此属性为大小为零的ndarray。

trans-unit.source: exog_coint (ndarray (nobs_tot x neqs) or None) – Deterministic terms inside the cointegration relation.
trans-unit.target: exog_coint（ndarray （nobs_tot x neqs ）或None）–协整关系中的确定性术语。

trans-unit.source: exog_coint (see Parameters)
trans-unit.target: exog_coint（请参阅参数）

trans-unit.source: exog_coint (ndarray (nobs_tot x neqs) or None) – Deterministic terms inside the cointegration relation.
trans-unit.target: exog_coint（ndarray（nobs_tot x neqs）或 None ）–协整关系内的确定性术语。

trans-unit.source: exog_coint (ndarray (nobs_tot x neqs) or None, default: None) – Deterministic terms inside the cointegration relation.
trans-unit.target: exog_coint（ndarray（nobs_tot x neqs）或 None ，默认值： None ）–协整关系中的确定性术语。

trans-unit.source: exog_coint_coefs (ndarray (exog_coint.shape[1] x coint_rank) or None) – If deterministic terms inside the cointegration relation are passed via the exog_coint parameter, then exog_coint_coefs contains the corresponding estimated coefficients. As such exog_coint_coefs represents the last rows of det_coef_coint. If no deterministic terms were passed via the exog_coint parameter, this attribute is None.
trans-unit.target: exog_coint_coefs（ndarray（exog_coint.shape [1] x coint_rank ）或 None ）–如果通过 exog_coint 参数传递了协整关系内的确定性项，则 exog_coint_coefs 将包含相应的估计系数。因此 exog_coint_coefs 代表的最后一行 det_coef_coint 。如果没有通过 exog_coint 参数传递确定性术语，则此属性为 None 。

trans-unit.source: exog_extra (None or array_like) – Explanatory variables that are jointly tested for inclusion in the model, i.e. omitted variables.
trans-unit.target: exog_extra（None 或array_like）–解释性变量，它们共同测试是否包含在模型中，即省略的变量。

trans-unit.source: exog_het (array_like) – This contains variables that might create data dependent heteroscedasticity.
trans-unit.target: exog_het（array_like）–它包含可能创建数据相关的异方差的变量。

trans-unit.source: exog_i (ndarray or string) – exogenous, explanatory variable. If string is given, you can use a arbitrary translations as with a formula.
trans-unit.target: exog_i（ndarray 或string）–外生的解释性变量。如果给出了字符串，则可以像公式一样使用任意翻译。

trans-unit.source: exog_idx (int) – index of regressor in exog matrix
trans-unit.target: exog_idx（int）– exog矩阵中回归变量的索引

trans-unit.source: exog_idx (int) – index of the exogenous variable in the columns of exog
trans-unit.target: exog_idx（int）– exog列中外生变量的索引

trans-unit.source: exog_idx (int or string) – Exogenous, explanatory variable. If string is given, it should be the variable name that you want to use, and you can use arbitrary translations as with a formula.
trans-unit.target: exog_idx（int 或string）–外生的解释性变量。如果给出了字符串，则它应该是您要使用的变量名，并且可以将任意转换与公式一起使用。

trans-unit.source: exog_infl (array, optional) – A reference to the zero-inflated exogenous design. If not assigned, will be used exog from fitting.
trans-unit.target: exog_infl（数组，可选）–对零膨胀外生设计的引用。如果未分配，将从装配中使用exog。

trans-unit.source: exog_infl (array_like or None) – Explanatory variables for the binary inflation model, i.e. for mixing probability model. If None, then a constant is used.
trans-unit.target: exog_infl（array_like 或None）–二进制膨胀模型的解释变量，即混合概率模型的解释变量。如果为None，则使用常量。

trans-unit.source: exog_miss (DataFrame) – Current values of the predictors where the variable to be Imputed is missing.
trans-unit.target: exog_miss（DataFrame）–缺少要插补变量的预测变量的当前值。

trans-unit.source: exog_obs (DataFrame) – Current values of the predictors where the variable to be imputed is observed.
trans-unit.target: exog_obs（DataFrame）–观察到要插入变量的预测变量的当前值。

trans-unit.source: exog_others (ndarray or list of strings) – other exogenous, explanatory variables. If a list of strings is given, each item is a term in formula. You can use a arbitrary translations as with a formula. The effect of these variables will be removed by OLS regression.
trans-unit.target: exog_others（ndarray 或字符串列表）–其他外生的解释性变量。如果给出了字符串列表，则每个项目都是公式中的一个术语。您可以像公式一样使用任意翻译。这些变量的影响将通过OLS回归消除。

trans-unit.source: exog_predict (array_like, optional) – Evaluation data for the independent variables.
trans-unit.target: exog_predict（array_like ，optional）–自变量的评估数据。

trans-unit.source: exog_predict (array_like, optional) – The evaluation independent variables at which the cdf is estimated. If not specified the training independent variables are used.
trans-unit.target: exog_predict（array_like ，optional）–评估cdf的评估独立变量。如果未指定，则使用训练自变量。

trans-unit.source: exog_re (2d array-like) – A matrix of covariates used to determine the variance and covariance structure (the “random effects” covariates). If None, defaults to a random intercept for each group.
trans-unit.target: exog_re（2d array-like）–用于确定方差和协方差结构（“随机效应”协变量）的协变量矩阵。如果为None，则默认为每个组的随机截距。

trans-unit.source: exog_tvtp (array_like, optional) – Array of exogenous or lagged variables to use in calculating time-varying transition probabilities (TVTP). TVTP is only used if this variable is provided. If an intercept is desired, a column of ones must be explicitly included in this array.
trans-unit.target: exog_tvtp（array_like ，optional）–用于计算时变转移概率（TVTP）的外生或滞后变量的数组。仅在提供此变量的情况下使用TVTP。如果需要拦截，则必须在此数组中明确包含一列。

trans-unit.source: exog_vc (array-like) – Array of covariates for the random part of the model. A scipy.sparse array may be provided, or else the passed array will be converted to sparse internally.
trans-unit.target: exog_vc（类似数组）–模型随机部分的协变量数组。可以提供scipy.sparse数组，否则传递的数组将在内部转换为稀疏。

trans-unit.source: exog_vc (dict-like) – A dictionary containing specifications of the variance component terms. See below for details.
trans-unit.target: exog_vc（类似dict的字典）–包含方差成分项规范的字典。有关详情，请参见下文。

trans-unit.source: expect – The calculated expected value.
trans-unit.target: 期望 –计算的期望值。

trans-unit.source: expfreq (array) – theoretical frequencies according to distribution
trans-unit.target: expfreq（数组）–根据分布的理论频率

trans-unit.source: expoential (bool, optional) – Type of trend component.
trans-unit.target: expoential（布尔型，可选）–趋势分量的类型。

trans-unit.source: exposure (array-like or None) – Log(exposure) will be added to the linear prediction in the model. Exposure is only valid if the log link is used. If provided, it must be an array with the same length as endog.
trans-unit.target: 曝光（类似数组或无）-Log（曝光）将添加到模型中的线性预测中。仅当使用日志链接时，曝光才有效。如果提供的话，它必须是与endg长度相同的数组。

trans-unit.source: exposure (array-like, optional) – Exposure for exog, if exposure is None, model exposure is used. Only allowed if link function is the logarithm.
trans-unit.target: 曝光（数组状，可选）–曝光曝光，如果曝光为“无”，则使用模型曝光。仅当链接函数为对数时才允许。

trans-unit.source: exposure (array-like, optional) – Exposure time values, only can be used with the log link function. See notes for details.
trans-unit.target: 曝光（类似数组，可选）–曝光时间值，只能与log link功能一起使用。有关详细信息，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: exposure (array, optional) – Log(exposure) is added to the linear prediction with coefficient equal to 1. If exposure is specified, then it will be logged by the method. The user does not need to log it first.
trans-unit.target: 曝光（数组，可选）–将Log（exposure）添加到系数等于1的线性预测中。如果指定了曝光，则将通过该方法进行记录。用户不需要先登录。

trans-unit.source: exposure (array_like) – Log(exposure) is added to the linear prediction with coefficient equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: 曝光（array_like）–将Log（exposure）与系数等于1的线性预测相加。

trans-unit.source: exposure (array_like, optional) – Log(exposure) is added to the linear prediction with coefficient
trans-unit.target: 曝光（array_like ，可选）–将Log（exposure）添加到具有系数的线性预测中

trans-unit.source: exposure (string or (int, int) tuple) – The name or column position of the treatment/exposure variable. If positions are given, the first integer is the column position of the exposure variable in the outcome model and the second integer is the position of the exposure variable in the mediator model. If a string is given, it must be the name of the exposure variable in both regression models.
trans-unit.target: 暴露（字符串或（int ，int ）元组）–处理/暴露变量的名称或列位置。如果给出位置，则第一个整数是结果模型中暴露变量的列位置，第二个整数是介体模型中暴露变量的位置。如果给出了字符串，则它必须是两个回归模型中的暴露变量的名称。

trans-unit.source: expval (array-like) – The expected value of endog for each observed value in the group.
trans-unit.target: expval（类似数组）–组中每个观察值的endg期望值。

trans-unit.source: external (bool) – Whether to use externally or internally studentized residuals. It is recommended to leave external as True.
trans-unit.target: 外部（布尔）–是使用外部还是内部学生化残差。建议将external保留为True。

trans-unit.source: extra_constraints (ndarray) – not tested yet
trans-unit.target: extra_constraints（ndarray）–尚未测试

trans-unit.source: extrapolate_trend (int or 'freq', optional) – If set to > 0, the trend resulting from the convolution is linear least-squares extrapolated on both ends (or the single one if two_sided is False) considering this many (+1) closest points. If set to ‘freq’, use freq closest points. Setting this parameter results in no NaN values in trend or resid components.
trans-unit.target: extrapolate_trend（int 或'freq' ，可选）–如果设置为> 0，则考虑到这么多（+1）最接近的值，由卷积产生的趋势是在两端外推线性最小二乘法（如果two_side为False，则为单极最小二乘）。点。如果设置为“频率”，请使用 freq 最近点。设置此参数将导致趋势或残油成分中没有NaN值。

trans-unit.target: f（函数）– f(*((x,)+args), **kwargs) 返回一个值或一维数组

trans-unit.target: 因数（Factor）–拟合因数类

trans-unit.target: factor_labels（无，str的列表）–用于成对标签的因子水平的标签。如果未提供，则使用公式design_info中的标签。

trans-unit.target: family（家庭类实例）–默认为高斯。指定二项式分布族= sm.family.Binomial（）每个族都可以将链接实例作为参数。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.family.family。

trans-unit.source: family (family class instance) – The default is Gaussian. To specify the binomial distribution use family=sm.families.Binomial(). Each family can take a link instance as an argument. See statsmodels.genmod.families.family for more information.
trans-unit.target: family（家庭类实例）–默认为高斯。要指定二项式分布，请使用 family=sm.families.Binomial() 。每个族都可以将链接实例作为参数。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.genmod.families.family。

trans-unit.source: fft (bool) – Whether or not to use FFT. FFT implementation is more computationally efficient. However, only the Gaussian kernel is implemented. If FFT is False, then a ‘nobs’ x ‘gridsize’ intermediate array is created.

trans-unit.source: formula (string) – Conditional formula for imputation. Defaults to a formula with main effects for all other variables in dataset. The formula should only include an expression for the mean structure, e.g. use ‘x1 + x2’ not ‘x4 ~ x1 + x2’.
trans-unit.target: 公式（字符串）–插补的条件公式。默认为对数据集中所有其他变量具有主要影响的公式。该公式应仅包括均值结构的表达式，例如，使用“ x1 + x2”而不是“ x4〜x1 + x2”。

trans-unit.source: formula (string) – Formula for the endog and fixed effects terms (use ~ to separate dependent and independent expressions).

trans-unit.source: free (MixedLMParams object) – If not None, this is a mask that allows parameters to be held fixed at specified values. A 1 indicates that the correspondinig parameter is estimated, a 0 indicates that it is fixed at its starting value. Setting the cov_re component to the identity matrix fits a model with independent random effects. Note that some optimization methods do not respect this constraint (bfgs and lbfgs both work).
trans-unit.target: free（MixedLMParams对象）–如果不是 None ，则这是一个掩码，允许将参数固定为指定值。1表示已估计对应的参数，0表示已固定为其初始值。将 cov_re 组件设置为单位矩阵适合具有独立随机效应的模型。请注意，某些优化方法不遵守此约束（bfgs和lbfgs均起作用）。

trans-unit.target: freq（int ，optional）–系列的频率。如果x不是熊猫对象，则必须使用。如果x是具有时间序列索引的熊猫对象，则覆盖x的默认周期性。

trans-unit.source: freq (str {"aq","qm", "other"}) – “aq” - Benchmarking an annual series to quarterly. “mq” - Benchmarking a quarterly series to monthly. “other” - Custom stride. A kwarg, k, must be supplied.
trans-unit.target: freq（str {“ aq” ，“ qm” ，“ other”}）–“ aq”-将年度系列设定为季度基准。“ mq”-将每个季度的基准确定为每月一次。“其他”-自定义步伐。必须提供kwarg。

trans-unit.source: freq_seasonal (list of dicts or None, optional.) – Whether (and how) to model seasonal component(s) with trig. functions. If specified, there is one dictionary for each frequency-domain seasonal component. Each dictionary must have the key, value pair for ‘period’ – integer and may have a key, value pair for ‘harmonics’ – integer. If ‘harmonics’ is not specified in any of the dictionaries, it defaults to the floor of period/2.
trans-unit.target: freq_seasonal（字典列表或None ，可选。）–是否（以及如何）使用trig对季节性要素进行建模。功能。如果指定，则每个频域季节性分量都有一个字典。每个字典必须具有“句号”（整数）的键值对，并且可能具有“谐波”（整数）的键值对。如果未在任何词典中指定“谐波”，则默认为周期/ 2的下限。

trans-unit.source: gamma (ndarray (neqs x neqs*(k_ar-1))) – Array containing the estimates of the \(k_{ar}-1\) parameter matrices \(\Gamma_1, \dots, \Gamma_{k_{ar}-1}\) of a VECM(\(k_{ar}-1\)). The submatrices are stacked horizontally from left to right.

trans-unit.source: gamma_low (float) – Lower bound for gamma when finding lower limit. If function returns f(a) and f(b) must have different signs, consider lowering gamma_low.

trans-unit.source: gap (float or array of floats) – The list of gaps to be applied on each subdivision. If the lenght of the given array is less of the number of subcategories (or if it’s a single number) it will extend it with exponentially decreasing gaps

trans-unit.target: gleft（元组列表）–左侧表的元素，元组为（（名称，值）对。如果gleft为None，则创建默认表

trans-unit.source: gls (bool, optional) – Flag indicating to implement a two-step GLS estimator where in the first step principal components are used to estimate residuals, and then the inverse residual variance is used as a set of weights to estimate the final principal components. Setting gls to True requires ncomp to be less then the min of the number of rows or columns
trans-unit.target: gls（bool ，optional）–指示实现两步GLS估计器的标志，其中第一步中使用主成分来估计残差，然后将残差逆方差用作一组权重来估计最终的主成分。将gls设置为True要求ncomp小于行或列数的最小值

trans-unit.source: grad – gradient or Jacobian

trans-unit.target: grad（nparray）–如果return_grad == True，则为渐变

trans-unit.target: gridsize（int）–如果gridsize为None，则使用max（len（X），50）。

trans-unit.source: gright (list of tuples or None) – elements for the right table, tuples are (name, value) pairs
trans-unit.target: gright（元组列表或None）–右表中的元素，元组是（名称，值）对

trans-unit.source: group_order (list of strings, optional) – the desired order for the group mean results to be reported in. If not specified, results are reported in increasing order. If group_order does not contain all labels that are in groups, then only those observations are kept that have a label in group_order.
trans-unit.target: group_order（字符串列表，可选）–报告组均值结果的所需顺序。如果未指定，则结果按递增顺序报告。如果group_order不包含组中的所有标签，则仅保留那些在group_order中具有标签的观测值。

trans-unit.source: groupidx (list of tuple) – each tuple should contain the start and end index for an individual. (groupidx might change in future).

trans-unit.target: groups（array_like）–组标签或指示符，两个组的数据在单个一维数组x中给出。如果组标签不是[0,1]，则

trans-unit.target: groups（ndarray ，1d）–具有组的数组，可以是字符串或整数

trans-unit.source: h0 (str) – A string describing the null hypothesis. It will be used in the summary.
trans-unit.target: h0（str）–描述原假设的字符串。摘要中将使用它。

trans-unit.source: h (function mapping 1d vector to 1d vector) – The contribution of the model to the ELBO function can be expressed as y_i*lp_i + Eh_i(z), where y_i and lp_i are the response and linear predictor for observation i, and z is a standard normal rangom variable. This formulation can be achieved for any GLM with a canonical link function.
trans-unit.target: h（将1d向量映射到1d向量的函数）–模型对ELBO函数的贡献可以表示为y_i * lp_i + Eh_i（z），其中y_i和lp_i是响应和观测i的线性预测变量，z为标准的正常rangom变量。对于具有规范链接功能的任何GLM，都可以实现此公式。

trans-unit.source: half_length (float in (0, 1)) – desired half length of the confidence interval
trans-unit.target: half_length（浮在（0 ，1 ）） -所需的一半的置信区间的长度

trans-unit.source: hamilton_representation (boolean, optional) – Whether or not to use the Hamilton representation of an ARMA process (if True) or the Harvey representation (if False). Default is False.
trans-unit.target: hamilton_representation（boolean ，optional）–是使用ARMA进程的汉密尔顿表示（如果为True）还是使用Harvey表示（如果为False）。默认值为False。

trans-unit.source: has_constant (str {'raise', 'add', 'skip'}) – Behavior if data already has a constant. The default will return data without adding another constant. If ‘raise’, will raise an error if a constant is present. Using ‘add’ will duplicate the constant, if one is present.
trans-unit.target: has_constant（str {'raise' ，'add' ，'skip'}）– data 已经具有常量的行为。默认值将返回数据而无需添加另一个常量。如果为“ raise”，则在存在常量的情况下将引发错误。如果存在常数，则使用“ add”将复制该常数。

trans-unit.source: has_constant (str {'raise', 'add', 'skip'}) – Controls what happens when trend is ‘c’ and a constant already exists in X. ‘raise’ will raise an error. ‘add’ will duplicate a constant. ‘skip’ will return the data without change. ‘skip’ is the default.
trans-unit.target: has_constant（str {'raise' ，'add' ，'skip'}）–控制趋势为'c'并且X中已经存在一个常数时发生的情况。'raise '将引发错误。'add'将复制一个常量。'skip'将不做任何更改就返回数据。默认为“跳过”。

trans-unit.source: has_optimal_weights (If true, then the calculation of the covariance) – matrix assumes that we have optimal GMM with \(W = S^{-1}\). Default is True. TODO: do we want to have a different default after onestep?
trans-unit.target: has_optimal_weights（如果为true ，则计算协方差）–矩阵假定我们具有\（W = S ^ {-1} \）的最佳GMM。默认值为True。TODO：我们要在 onestep 之后设置其他默认值吗？

trans-unit.source: hasconst (None or bool) – Indicates whether the RHS includes a user-supplied constant. If True, a constant is not checked for and k_constant is set to 1 and all result statistics are calculated as if a constant is present. If False, a constant is not checked for and k_constant is set to 0.
trans-unit.target: hasconst（None 或bool）–指示RHS是否包括用户提供的常量。如果为True，则不检查常量，并将k_constant设置为1，并计算所有结果统计信息，就好像存在常量一样。如果为False，则不检查常量，并且k_constant设置为0。

trans-unit.target: hessian_factor –用于计算Hessian的一维权重向量。粗麻布由 (exog.T * hessian_factor).dot(exog)

trans-unit.source: hide_complete_columns (boolean) – If True, columns with no missing values are not drawn.
trans-unit.target: hide_complete_columns（boolean）–如果为True，则不会绘制没有缺失值的列。

trans-unit.target: hide_complete_rows（boolean）–如果为True，则不会绘制没有缺失值的行。

trans-unit.source: high (float) – Maximum period for oscillations BK suggest that the U.S. business cycle has 32 for quarterly data and 8 for annual data.
trans-unit.target: 高（浮动）–振荡的最大周期BK表明，美国商业周期的季度数据为32，年度数据为8。

trans-unit.source: high (float) – Maximum period of oscillations. Features above high periodicity are filtered out. Default is 32 for quarterly data, giving an 8 year periodicity.
trans-unit.target: 高（浮动）–最大振荡周期。高周期性的特征被滤除。季度数据的默认值为32，周期为8年。

trans-unit.source: high (float, optional) – High end of the bracketing interval [a,b] to be used in the search for the power. Defaults to 5.
trans-unit.target: 高（float ，可选）–包围度[a，b]的上限，用于搜索度数。默认为5。

trans-unit.source: highlight_max (boolean) – This add a background color to the largest coefficient in each row.
trans-unit.target: highlight_max（boolean）–这会为每行的最大系数添加背景色。

trans-unit.source: history_callback (function) – A function that is called after each complete imputation cycle. The return value is appended to history. The MICEData object is passed as the sole argument to history_callback.
trans-unit.target: history_callback（函数）–在每个完整的插补循环后调用的函数。返回值将附加到 history 。MICEData对象是作为 history_callback 的唯一参数传递的。
