trans-unit.target: histsupp（数组）–直方图的bin边界，（为数字鲁棒性添加了1e-8）

trans-unit.source: horizontal (bool, optional (default True)) – The starting direction of the split (by default along the horizontal axis)
trans-unit.target: 水平（bool ，可选（默认为True ））–分割的开始方向（默认为沿水平轴）

trans-unit.source: hqic – information criterion
trans-unit.target: hqic –信息标准

trans-unit.source: hqic (float) – Hannan-Quinn Information Criterion -2*llf + 2*(df_model)*log(log(nobs)) Like bic if the model is fit using conditional sum of squares then the k_ar pre-sample observations are not counted in nobs.
trans-unit.target: hqic（float）– 汉南奎因信息准则-2 * llf + 2 *（ df_model ）* log（log（nobs））与 bic 相似，如果使用条件平方和拟合模型，则不计入 k_ar 前样本观察值在 nobs 。

trans-unit.source: hqic (float) – Hannan-Quinn Information Criterion.
trans-unit.target: hqic（float）– Hannan-Quinn信息标准。

trans-unit.source: html – concatenated summary tables in HTML format
trans-unit.target: html – HTML格式的串联汇总表

trans-unit.source: hypotheses (A list of tuples) –
trans-unit.target: 假设（元组列表）–

trans-unit.source: ic (str {'aic','bic','hic','t-stat'}) – Criterion used for selecting the optimal lag length. aic - Akaike Information Criterion bic - Bayes Information Criterion t-stat - Based on last lag hqic - Hannan-Quinn Information Criterion If any of the information criteria are selected, the lag length which results in the lowest value is selected. If t-stat, the model starts with maxlag and drops a lag until the highest lag has a t-stat that is significant at the 95 % level.
trans-unit.target: ic（str {'aic' ，'bic' ，'hic' ，'t-stat'}）–用于选择最佳滞后长度的标准。aic-Akaike信息准则bic-贝叶斯信息准则t-stat-基于最后滞后hqic-Hannan-Quinn信息准则如果选择任何信息条件，则选择导致最小值的滞后长度。如果为t-stat，则模型从最大滞后开始，然后降低滞后，直到最高滞后的t-stat在95％的水平上显着。

trans-unit.source: ic (str {'aic','bic','hqic','t-stat'}) – Criterion used for selecting the optimal lag length. See AR.fit.
trans-unit.target: ic（str {'aic' ，'bic' ，'hqic' ，'t-stat'}）–用于选择最佳滞后长度的标准。请参阅 AR.fit 。

trans-unit.source: ic (str, list) – Information criteria to report. Either a single string or a list of different criteria is possible.
trans-unit.target: ic（str ，list）–要报告的信息标准。单个字符串或不同条件的列表都是可能的。

trans-unit.source: ic ({'aic', 'fpe', 'hqic', 'bic', None}) – Information criterion to use for VAR order selection. aic : Akaike fpe : Final prediction error hqic : Hannan-Quinn bic : Bayesian a.k.a. Schwarz
trans-unit.target: ic（{'aic' ，'fpe' ，'hqic' ，'bic' ，无}）-用于VAR订单选择的信息标准。aic：赤池fpe：最终预测误差hqic：汉南奎因bic：贝叶斯又名施瓦茨

trans-unit.source: icbest (float) – The maximized information criterion if autolag is not None.
trans-unit.target: icbest（float）–如果autolag不为None，则最大化信息标准。

trans-unit.source: ics (dict) – The keys are the strings "aic", "bic", "hqic", and "fpe". A corresponding value is a list of information criteria for various numbers of lags.
trans-unit.target: ics（dict）–键是字符串 "aic" ， "bic" ， "hqic" 和 "fpe" 。相应的值是各种滞后的信息标准列表。

trans-unit.source: ident (array-like) – Array of labels showing which random terms (columns of exog_vc) have a common variance.
trans-unit.target: ident（类似数组）–标签数组，显示哪些随机项（ exog_vc 的列）具有共同的方差。

trans-unit.source: idx (integer) – column index of variable according to which observations are sorted for the split
trans-unit.target: idx（integer）–变量的列索引，根据观察结果对拆分进行排序

trans-unit.source: imp_hist_args (dict) – Keyword arguments to be passed to pyplot.hist when creating the histogram for imputed values.
trans-unit.target: imp_hist_args（dict）–为估算值创建直方图时将传递给pyplot.hist的关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: impulse (int or array_like) – If an integer, the state innovation to pulse; must be between 0 and k_posdef-1 where k_posdef is the same as in the state space model. Alternatively, a custom impulse vector may be provided; must be a column vector with shape (k_posdef, 1).
trans-unit.target: impulse（int 或array_like）–如果为整数，则状态为pulse；必须在0到 k_posdef-1 之间，其中 k_posdef 与状态空间模型中的相同。可替代地，可以提供定制的脉冲矢量；例如，必须是形状为 (k_posdef, 1) 的列向量。

trans-unit.source: impulse (int or array_like) – If an integer, the state innovation to pulse; must be between 0 and k_posdef-1. Alternatively, a custom impulse vector may be provided; must be shaped k_posdef x 1.
trans-unit.target: impulse（int 或array_like）–如果为整数，则状态为pulse；必须介于0和 k_posdef-1 之间。可替代地，可以提供定制的脉冲矢量；例如，必须定形为 k_posdef x 1 。

trans-unit.source: impulse (string or int) – variable providing the impulse
trans-unit.target: 脉冲（字符串或整数）–提供脉冲的变量

trans-unit.source: impulse_responses – Responses for each endogenous variable due to the impulse given by the impulse argument. A (steps + 1 x k_endog) array.
trans-unit.target: impulse_responses –对每个内生变量的响应，这是由于 impulse 参数给出的冲激引起的。一个（steps + 1 x k_endog）数组。

trans-unit.source: indep_endog (dict) – A dictionary mapping the equation to the column numbers of the the independent endogenous regressors in each equation. It is assumed that the system is inputed as broken up into LHS and RHS. For now, the values of the dict have to be sequences. Note that the keys for the equations should be zero-indexed.
trans-unit.target: indep_endog（dict）–将方程式映射到每个方程式中独立内生回归变量的列号的字典。假设系统被输入为LHS和RHS。目前，字典的值必须是序列。请注意，方程式的键应为零索引。

trans-unit.source: indep_type (str) – The type of the independent variables; specifed like dep_type.
trans-unit.target: indep_type（str）–自变量的类型；指定为 dep_type 。

trans-unit.source: index (array) – index (lags) of lag polynomial with non-zero elements

trans-unit.source: index (integer) – The group index.
trans-unit.target: index（整数）–组索引。

trans-unit.source: index (integer) – The index of the cluster for which the covariane or correlation matrix will be returned
trans-unit.target: index（integer）–将为其返回协变量或相关矩阵的聚类的索引

trans-unit.source: index (list, optional) – Gives the preferred order for the category ordering. If not specified will default to the given order. It doesn’t support named indexes for hierarchical Series. If a DataFrame is provided, it expects a list with the name of the columns.
trans-unit.target: index（list ，可选）–给出类别排序的首选顺序。如果未指定，则默认为给定顺序。它不支持层次结构Series的命名索引。如果提供了DataFrame，则期望包含列名称的列表。

trans-unit.source: indicator – A low-frequency indicator series. It is assumed that there are no pre-sample indicators. Ie., the first indicators line up with the first benchmark.
trans-unit.target: 指示器 –低频指示器系列。假设没有预采样指标。即，第一个指标与第一个基准一致。

trans-unit.source: infl – the instance has methods to calculate the main influence and outlier measures for the OLS regression
trans-unit.target: infl –实例具有计算OLS回归的主要影响力和异常值的方法

trans-unit.source: inflation (string, 'logit' or 'probit') – The model for the zero inflation, either Logit (default) or Probit
trans-unit.target: 通货膨胀（字符串，“ logit” 或“ probit”）–零通货膨胀的模型，即Logit（默认）或Probit

trans-unit.source: init (array-like) – Initial values of the time-series prior to the first value of y. The default is zero.
trans-unit.target: init（类似数组）–在y的第一个值之前的时间序列的初始值。默认值为零。

trans-unit.source: init (string) – Specifies method for the initial estimates of the parameters. Default is None, which means that the least squares estimate is used. Currently it is the only available choice.
trans-unit.target: init（字符串）–指定参数初始估计的方法。默认值为“无”，这表示使用最小二乘估计。当前，它是唯一可用的选择。

trans-unit.source: init_kwds (dict-like) – Dictionary of keyword arguments passed to the init method of the analysis model.
trans-unit.target: init_kwds（类似字典的字典）–传递给分析模型的init方法的关键字参数字典。

trans-unit.target: init_kwds（dict-like）– vname 的init关键字参数，根据需要通过Patsy处理。

trans-unit.target: init_kwds（dit-like）–传递给模型init方法的关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: initial (array, optional) – Initial condition for the location parameter. Default is None, which uses the median of a.
trans-unit.target: initial（数组，可选）–位置参数的初始条件。默认值为无，使用a的中位数。

trans-unit.source: initial_state (array_like) – Known mean of the initial state vector.
trans-unit.target: initial_state（array_like）–初始状态向量的已知平均值。

trans-unit.source: initial_state (array_like, optional) – If known initialization is used, the mean of the initial state’s distribution.
trans-unit.target: initial_state（array_like ，optional）–如果使用已知的初始化，则为初始状态分布的均值。

trans-unit.source: initial_state (array_like, optional) – If specified, this is the state vector at time zero, which should be shaped (k_states x 1), where k_states is the same as in the state space model. If unspecified, but the model has been initialized, then that initialization is used. If unspecified and the model has not been initialized, then a vector of zeros is used. Note that this is not included in the returned simulated_states array.
trans-unit.target: initial_state（array_like ，optional）–如果指定，这是时间零时的状态向量，应整形为（ k_states x 1），其中 k_states 与状态空间模型中的状态向量相同。如果未指定，但是模型已经初始化，则使用该初始化。如果未指定并且尚未初始化模型，则使用零向量。请注意，这不包含在返回的 simulated_states 数组中。

trans-unit.source: initial_state_cov (array_like) – Known covariance matrix of the initial state vector.
trans-unit.target: initial_state_cov（array_like）–初始状态向量的已知协方差矩阵。

trans-unit.source: initial_state_cov (array_like, optional) – If known initialization is used, the covariance matrix of the initial state’s distribution.
trans-unit.target: initial_state_cov（array_like ，optional）–如果使用已知的初始化，则为初始状态分布的协方差矩阵。

trans-unit.source: initial_variance (float, optional) – Initial variance used when approximate diffuse initialization is specified. Default is 1e6.
trans-unit.target: initial_variance（float ，optional）–指定近似漫反射初始化时使用的初始方差。默认值为1e6。

trans-unit.source: initialization ({'approximate_diffuse','stationary','known'}, optional) – Initialization method for the initial state.
trans-unit.target: 初始化（{'approximate_diffuse' ，'stationary' ，'known'} ，可选）–初始状态的初始化方法。

trans-unit.source: initialization: in addition to defined state space matrices, all state space models must be initialized with the mean and variance for the initial distribution of the state vector. If the distribution is known, initialize_known(initial_state, initial_state_cov) can be called, or if the model is stationary (e.g. an ARMA model), initialize_stationary can be used. Otherwise, initialize_approximate_diffuse is a reasonable generic initialization (exact diffuse initialization is not yet available). Since the local linear trend model is not stationary (it is composed of random walks) and since the distribution is not generally known, we use initialize_approximate_diffuse below.
trans-unit.target: 初始化：除了定义的状态空间矩阵外，还必须使用均值和方差来初始化所有状态空间模型，以用于状态向量的初始分布。如果已知分布，则可以调用 initialize_known(initial_state, initial_state_cov) ，或者如果模型是固定的（例如ARMA模型），则可以使用 initialize_stationary 。否则， initialize_approximate_diffuse 是一个合理的通用初始化（尚无法使用精确的扩散初始化）。由于局部线性趋势模型不是固定的（它由随机游动组成），并且由于分布通常不是已知的，因此我们在下面使用 initialize_approximate_diffuse 。

trans-unit.target: inp（array，1d）–组合输入序列

trans-unit.source: inv_weights (None or ndarray) – inverse of the starting weighting matrix. If inv_weights are not given then the method start_weights is used which depends on the subclass, for IV subclasses inv_weights = z’z where z are the instruments, otherwise an identity matrix is used.

trans-unit.target: invcov（array-like ，optional）–一个qxq数组，用于基于限制矩阵指定逆协方差矩阵。

trans-unit.target: inversion_method（integer ，optional）–设置反转方法的位掩码值。有关详细信息，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: k_states, k_posdef: These two parameters must be provided to the base classes in initialization. The inform the statespace model about the size of, respectively, the state vector, above $\begin{pmatrix} \mu_t & \nu_t \end{pmatrix}'$, and the state error vector, above $\begin{pmatrix} \xi_t & \zeta_t \end{pmatrix}'$. Note that the dimension of the endogenous vector does not have to be specified, since it can be inferred from the endog array.
trans-unit.target: k_states和k_posdef：初始化时必须将这两个参数提供给基类​​。分别向状态空间模型告知$ \ begin {pmatrix} \ mu_t＆\ nu_t \ end {pmatrix}'$以上的状态向量的大小，以及$ \ begin {pmatrix}以上的状态误差向量的状态xi_t＆\ zeta_t \ end {pmatrix}'$。请注意，不必指定内源矢量的尺寸，因为可以从 endog 数组推断出来。

trans-unit.target: k_trend（float）–包括的趋势项数。'nc'= 0，'c'= 1。

trans-unit.source: kwargs – Additional arguments may required for forecasting beyond the end of the sample. See FilterResults.predict for more details.
trans-unit.target: kwargs –在样本末尾进行预测可能需要其他参数。有关更多详细信息，请参见 FilterResults.predict 。

trans-unit.source: kwargs – Additional arguments to the loglike method.
trans-unit.target: kwargs – loglike 方法的其他参数。

trans-unit.source: kwargs – Additional keyword arguments to pass to the Kalman filter. See KalmanFilter.filter for more details.
trans-unit.target: kwargs –传递给卡尔曼滤波器的其他关键字参数。有关更多详细信息，请参见 KalmanFilter.filter 。

trans-unit.source: kwargs – Additional keyword arguments to the loglike method.
trans-unit.target: kwargs – loglike 方法的其他关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: kwargs – Keyword arguments may be used to provide default values for state space matrices or for Kalman filtering options. See Representation, and KalmanFilter for more details.
trans-unit.target: kwargs –关键字参数可用于为状态空间矩阵或卡尔曼过滤选项提供默认值。有关更多详细信息，请参见 Representation 和 KalmanFilter 。

trans-unit.source: kwargs – See Notes for keyword arguments that can be passed to fit.
trans-unit.target: kwargs –有关可传递为适合的关键字参数的信息，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: kwargs – The keyword arguments are passed to the plot command for the fitted values points.
trans-unit.target: kwargs –将关键字参数传递给拟合值点的plot命令。

trans-unit.source: kwargs – The keyword arguments passed to plot for the points.
trans-unit.target: kwargs –传递给点图的关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: kwargs – These will be passed to the plot command used either plot or scatter. If you want to control the overall plotting options, use kwargs.
trans-unit.target: kwargs –这些将通过plot或scatter传递给plot命令。如果要控制整体绘图选项，请使用kwargs。

trans-unit.source: kwargs (dict) – Dictionary of additional keyword arguments for function f.
trans-unit.target: kwargs（dict）–函数 f 的附加关键字参数的字典。

trans-unit.source: kwargs (dict) – Keyword args are passed to get_margeff. This is the same as results.get_margeff. See there for more information.
trans-unit.target: kwargs（dict）–关键字args传递给 get_margeff 。这与results.get_margeff相同。有关更多信息，请参见此处。

trans-unit.source: kwargs (dict) – Keyword arguments for function f.
trans-unit.target: kwargs（dict）–函数 f 的关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: kwargs (args,) – Some models can take additional arguments or keywords, see the predict method of the model for the details.
trans-unit.target: kwargs（args ，）–一些模型可以使用其他参数或关键字，有关详细信息，请参见模型的预测方法。

trans-unit.source: kwargs (extra keyword arguments) – These are passed to the model with one exception. The eval_env keyword is passed to patsy. It can be either a patsy.EvalEnvironment object or an integer indicating the depth of the namespace to use. For example, the default eval_env=0 uses the calling namespace. If you wish to use a “clean” environment set eval_env=-1.
trans-unit.target: kwargs（额外的关键字参数）–除了一个例外，它们被传递给模型。该 eval_env 关键字传递给懦夫。它可以是 patsy.EvalEnvironment 对象，也可以是指示要使用的名称空间深度的整数。例如，默认的 eval_env=0 使用调用名称空间。如果您希望使用“干净”环境，请设置 eval_env=-1 。

trans-unit.source: kwargs (extra keyword arguments) – These are passed to the model with one exception. The eval_env keyword is passed to patsy. It can be either a patsy.EvalEnvironment object or an integer indicating the depth of the namespace to use. For example, the default eval_env=0 uses the calling namespace. If you wish to use a “clean” environment set eval_env=-1.
trans-unit.target: kwargs（额外的关键字参数）–除了一个例外，它们被传递给模型。该 eval_env 关键字传递给懦夫。它可以是 patsy.EvalEnvironment 对象，也可以是指示要使用的名称空间深度的整数。例如，默认的 eval_env=0 使用调用名称空间。如果您希望使用“干净”的环境，请设置 eval_env=-1 。

trans-unit.target: kwargs（关键字）–

trans-unit.target: kwds（任何值）–主要是如果需要存储其他变量来计算弯矩条件

trans-unit.source: kwds (depends on cov_type) – Required or optional arguments for robust covariance calculation. see Notes below
trans-unit.target: kwds（取决于cov_type）–鲁棒协方差计算的必需或可选参数。请参阅下面的注释

trans-unit.source: kwds (extra keyword arguments) – currently ignored, only for compatibility, consistent signature
trans-unit.target: kwds（额外的关键字参数）–当前被忽略，仅出于兼容性，一致的签名

trans-unit.source: kwds (floats, optional) –
trans-unit.target: kwds（浮点数，可选）–

trans-unit.source: kwds (keyword arguments) – kwds are directly used as fit keyword arguments for the null model, overriding any provided defaults.
trans-unit.target: kwds（关键字参数）– kwds 直接用作null模型的fit关键字参数，覆盖任何提供的默认值。

trans-unit.source: kwds (optional keywords for power function) – These remaining keyword arguments are used as arguments to the power function. Many power function support alternative as a keyword argument, two-sample test support ratio.
trans-unit.target: kwds（幂函数的可选关键字）–这些其余的关键字参数用作幂函数的参数。许多幂函数支持 alternative 作为关键字参数，二样本测试支持 ratio 。

trans-unit.source: kwds (optional keywords) – options for calculating cov_params
trans-unit.target: kwds（可选关键字）–计算cov_params的选项

trans-unit.source: label_rotation (float or list of float) – the rotation of the axis label (if present). If a list is given each axis can have a different rotation
trans-unit.target: label_rotation（float 或float 列表）–轴标签的旋转（如果存在）。如果给出列表，则每个轴可以有不同的旋转

trans-unit.source: labelizer (function (key) -> string, optional) – A function that generate the text to display at the center of each tile base on the key of that tile
trans-unit.target: labelizer（函数（键）->字符串，可选）–一个函数，该函数基于该图块的键生成要显示在每个图块中心的文本

trans-unit.source: labels (None or array_like) – If labels is not None, then it will be used as index to the returned pandas DataFrame. See also Returns below
trans-unit.target: 标签（无或array_like）–如果 labels 不是无，则它将用作返回的熊猫DataFrame的索引。另请参阅下面的退货

trans-unit.source: labels (list of str, optional) – Tick labels for the horizontal axis. If not given, integers 1..len(data) are used.
trans-unit.target: 标签（str的列表，可选）–水平轴的刻度标签。如果未给出，则使用整数 1..len(data) 。

trans-unit.source: labels (sequence of scalar or str, optional) – The labels or identifiers of the curves in data. If given, outliers are labeled in the plot.
trans-unit.target: 标签（标量或str的序列，可选）– data 曲线的标签或标识符。如果给出，则在图中标出离群值。

trans-unit.source: labels (sequence of scalar or str, optional) – The labels or identifiers of the curves in data. If not given, outliers are labeled in the plot with array indices.
trans-unit.target: 标签（标量或str的序列，可选）– data 曲线的标签或标识符。如果未给出，则在图中用数组索引标记离群值。

trans-unit.source: labels_kwargs (dict) – Keyword arguments that control annotate for the observation labels.
trans-unit.target: labels_kwargs（dict）–控制观察标签注释的关键字参数。

trans-unit.source: lag ('lagged', 'centered', or 'leading') – location of window relative to current position
trans-unit.target: 滞后（“滞后” ，“居中” 或“前导”）–窗口相对于当前位置的位置

trans-unit.source: lag_order (int) –
trans-unit.target: lag_order（int）–

trans-unit.source: lag_order (int, default 1) –
trans-unit.target: lag_order（int ，默认值1）–

trans-unit.source: lagmat – array with lagged observations, columns ordered by variable
trans-unit.target: lagmat –观测值滞后的数组，列按变量排序

trans-unit.source: lagmat (2d array) – array with lagged observations
trans-unit.target: lagmat（2d数组）–观测值滞后的数组

trans-unit.source: lags (None, int or array_like) – If lags is an integer then this is taken to be the largest lag that is included, the test result is reported for all smaller lag length. If lags is a list or array, then all lags are included up to the largest lag in the list, however only the tests for the lags in the list are reported. If lags is None, then the default maxlag is ‘min((nobs // 2 - 2), 40)’
trans-unit.target: 滞后（None ，int 或array_like）–如果滞后为整数，则将其视为包含的最大滞后，并报告所有较小滞后长度的测试结果。如果滞后是一个列表或数组，则所有滞后都包括在内，直到列表中的最大滞后，但是仅报告列表中滞后的测试。如果滞后为无，则默认最大滞后为'min（（nobs // 2-2），40）'

trans-unit.source: lags (None, int or array_like) – If lags is an integer then this is taken to be the largest lag that is included, the test result is reported for all smaller lag length. If lags is a list or array, then all lags are included up to the largest lag in the list, however only the tests for the lags in the list are reported. If lags is None, then the default maxlag is 12*(nobs/100)^{1/4}
trans-unit.target: 滞后（None ，int 或array_like）–如果滞后为整数，则将其视为包含的最大滞后，并报告所有较小滞后长度的测试结果。如果滞后是一个列表或数组，则所有滞后都包括在内，直到列表中的最大滞后，但是仅报告列表中滞后的测试。如果滞后为“无”，则默认最大滞后为12 *（nobs / 100）^ {1/4}

trans-unit.source: lags (int) – Indicates the number of lags to be used. If None (default), lags is set to int(12 * (n / 100)**(1 / 4)), as outlined in Schwert (1989).
trans-unit.target: 滞后（int）–指示要使用的滞后数。如果为None（默认），则将滞后时间设置为int（12 *（n / 100）**（1/4）），如Schwert（1989）所述。

trans-unit.source: lags (int) – The truncation lag parameter
trans-unit.target: lags（int）–截断延迟参数

trans-unit.source: lags (int) – number of coefficients to calculate
trans-unit.target: 滞后（int）–要计算的系数数

trans-unit.source: lags (int) – number of terms (lags plus zero lag) to include in returned acf
trans-unit.target: 滞后（int）–包含在返回的acf中的项数（滞后加零滞后）

trans-unit.source: lags (int) – number of terms (lags plus zero lag) to include in returned pacf
trans-unit.target: 滞后（int）–包含在返回的pacf中的项数（滞后加零滞后）

trans-unit.source: lags (int or array_like, optional) – int or Array of lag values, used on horizontal axis. Uses np.arange(lags) when lags is an int. If not provided, lags=np.arange(len(corr)) is used.
trans-unit.target: 滞后（int 或array_like ，可选）– int或滞后值数组，在水平轴上使用。当lags为int时使用np.arange（lags）。如果未提供，则使用 lags=np.arange(len(corr)) 。

trans-unit.source: lags (integer, optional) – Number of lags to include in the correlogram. Default is 10.
trans-unit.target: 滞后（整数，可选）–要包含在相关图中的滞后数。默认值为10。

trans-unit.source: lam_max (float) – Tuning parameter for spectral projected gradient optimization (largest allowed step in the search direction).
trans-unit.target: lam_max（float）–用于频谱投影梯度优化的调整参数（搜索方向上允许的最大步长）。

trans-unit.source: lam_min (float) – Tuning parameter for spectral projected gradient optimization (smallest allowed step in the search direction).
trans-unit.target: lam_min（float）–用于频谱投影梯度优化的调整参数（搜索方向上允许的最小步长）。

trans-unit.source: lamb (float) – The Hodrick-Prescott smoothing parameter. A value of 1600 is suggested for quarterly data. Ravn and Uhlig suggest using a value of 6.25 (1600/4**4) for annual data and 129600 (1600*3**4) for monthly data.
trans-unit.target: lamb（float）– Hodrick-Prescott平滑参数。对于季度数据，建议值为1600。Ravn和Uhlig建议对于年度数据使用6.25（1600/4 ** 4），对于每月数据使用129600（1600 * 3 ** 4）。

trans-unit.source: lambd (float or string) –
trans-unit.target: lambd（浮点型或字符串型）–

trans-unit.source: lamda (float) – weight for Ridge correction to initial (X’X)^{-1}
trans-unit.target: lamda（float）–脊校正到初始（X'X）^ {-1}的权重

trans-unit.source: large_sample (bool) – Flag indicating whether to use a heteroskedasticity robust version of the LR test, which is a modified LM test.
trans-unit.target: large_sample（bool）–标志，指示是否使用LR测试的异方差稳健版本，它是经过修改的LM测试。

trans-unit.source: latex – summary tables and extra text as string of Latex
trans-unit.target: latex –摘要表和其他文本作为Latex的字符串

trans-unit.source: lb (float) – The lower confidence limit.
trans-unit.target: lb（浮动）–下限置信度。

trans-unit.source: lbvalue (float or array) – test statistic
trans-unit.target: lbvalue（浮点型或数组）–测试统计

trans-unit.source: lcb (array-like) – The lower confidence limits corresponding to the points in surv_times.
trans-unit.target: lcb（类似数组）–与 surv_times 中的点相对应的置信下限。

trans-unit.source: lcb (float) – The lower confidence limit.
trans-unit.target: lcb（float）–下限置信度。

trans-unit.source: leads (int) – number of observations to calculate
trans-unit.target: Leads（int）–要计算的观察数

trans-unit.source: legend_loc (string, optional) – The location of the legend in the plot. Default is upper left.
trans-unit.target: legend_loc（字符串，可选）–图例在图例中的位置。默认为左上方。

trans-unit.source: level (bool or string, optional) – Whether or not to include a level component. Default is False. Can also be a string specification of the level / trend component; see Notes for available model specification strings.
trans-unit.target: 级别（bool 或string ，可选）–是否包括级别组件。默认值为False。也可以是水平/趋势成分的字符串说明；有关可用的模型规范字符串，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: level (boolean, optional) – Whether or not to plot the level component, if applicable. Default is True.
trans-unit.target: level（布尔值，可选）–是否绘制级别分量（如果适用）。默认值为True。

trans-unit.source: level (scalar, optional) – Default is 0.9.
trans-unit.target: 级别（标量，可选）–默认为0.9。

trans-unit.source: levs (list) – Levels to be drawn on the contour plot. Default = (.001, .01, .05, .1, .2)
trans-unit.target: levs（列表）–在等高线图上绘制的水平。默认值=（.001，.01，.05，.1，.2）

trans-unit.source: levs (list) – Which values of significance the contour lines will be drawn. Default is [.2, .1, .05, .01, .001]
trans-unit.target: levs（列表）–将绘制轮廓线的有效值。默认值为[.2，.1，.05，.01，.001]

trans-unit.source: limit_lines_kwds (keywords) – Options to to style the scatter plot. Accepts any keywords for the matplotlib Axes.axhline plotting method
trans-unit.target: limit_lines_kwds（关键字）–用于设置散点图样式的选项。接受matplotlib Axes.axhline绘图方法的任何关键字

trans-unit.source: lin_pred – Linear predictors based on the mean response variables. The value of the link function at the given mu.
trans-unit.target: lin_pred –基于平均响应变量的线性预测变量。给定亩的链接函数的值。

trans-unit.source: lin_pred (array-like) – The values of the linear predictor.
trans-unit.target: lin_pred（类似数组）–线性预测变量的值。

trans-unit.source: lin_pred (array) – Values of the linear predictor of the model. \(X \cdot \beta\) in a classical linear model.
trans-unit.target: lin_pred（array）–模型的线性预测变量的值。经典线性模型中的\（X \ cdot \ beta \）。

trans-unit.source: lin_trend (ndarray (neqs x 1) or (neqs x 0)) – If a linear deterministic term outside the cointegration is specified within the deterministic parameter, then lin_trend contains the corresponding estimated coefficients. As such it represents the corresponding column of det_coef_coint. If there is no linear deterministic term outside the cointegration relation, then lin_trend is an ndarray of size zero.
trans-unit.target: lin_trend（ndarray（neqs x 1）或（neqs x 0））–如果在确定性参数中指定了协整之外的线性确定性项，则 lin_trend 包含相应的估计系数。因此，它代表 det_coef_coint 的相应列。如果在协整关系之外没有线性确定性项，则 lin_trend 是大小为零的ndarray。

trans-unit.source: lin_trend_coint (ndarray (1 x coint_rank)) – If there is a linear deterministic term inside the cointegration relation, then lin_trend_coint contains the corresponding estimated coefficients. As such it represents the corresponding row of det_coef_coint. If there is no linear deterministic term inside the cointegration relation, then lin_trend_coint is an ndarray of zeros.
trans-unit.target: lin_trend_coint（ndarray（1 x coint_rank ））–如果协整关系中存在线性确定性项，则 lin_trend_coint 包含相应的估计系数。这样，它表示 det_coef_coint 的相应行。如果协整关系中没有线性确定性项，则 lin_trend_coint 是零的ndarray。

trans-unit.source: line (str {'45', 's', 'r', q'} or None) –
trans-unit.target: 行（str {'45' ，'s' ，'r' ，q'} 或无）–

trans-unit.source: line (str {'45', 's', 'r', q'} or None, optional) –
trans-unit.target: 行（str {'45' ，'s' ，'r' ，q'} 或无，可选）–

trans-unit.source: line (str {'45','r','s','q'}) –
trans-unit.target: 行（str {'45' ，'r' ，'s' ，'q'}）–

trans-unit.source: linear (bool) – If True, returns the linear predicted values. If False, returns the value of the inverse of the model’s link function at the linear predicted values.
trans-unit.target: linear（bool）–如果为True，则返回线性预测值。如果为False，则以线性预测值返回模型的链接函数的逆值。

trans-unit.source: linear (bool, optional) – If True, returns the linear predictor dot(exog,params). Else, returns the value of the cdf at the linear predictor.
trans-unit.target: 线性（bool ，可选）–如果为True，则返回线性预测值点（exog，params）。否则，返回线性预测变量处的cdf值。

trans-unit.source: linestyles (list, optional) – If given, must have length == number of levels in trace.
trans-unit.target: linestyles（list ，optional）–如果给定，则其长度必须为==跟踪级别。

trans-unit.source: linewidth (int) – width of vertical bars
trans-unit.target: 线宽（int）–竖线的宽度

trans-unit.source: link (a link function instance) – Link is the linear transformation function. See the individual families for available links.
trans-unit.target: link（链接函数实例）– Link是线性变换函数。有关可用链接，请参见各个家庭。

trans-unit.source: link (a link instance, optional) – The default link for the Binomial family is the logit link. Available links are logit, probit, cauchy, log, and cloglog. See statsmodels.genmod.families.links for more information.
trans-unit.target: 链接（链接实例，可选）–二项式族的默认链接是logit链接。可用链接为logit，probit，cauchy，log和cloglog。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.genmod.families.links。

trans-unit.source: link (a link instance, optional) – The default link for the Gamma family is the inverse link. Available links are log, identity, and inverse. See statsmodels.genmod.families.links for more information.
trans-unit.target: link（链接实例，可选）– Gamma系列的默认链接是反向链接。可用链接为对数，标识和反向。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.genmod.families.links。

trans-unit.source: link (a link instance, optional) – The default link for the Gaussian family is the identity link. Available links are log, identity, and inverse. See statsmodels.genmod.families.links for more information.
trans-unit.target: 链接（链接实例，可选）–高斯族的默认链接是身份链接。可用链接为对数，标识和反向。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.genmod.families.links。

trans-unit.source: link (a link instance, optional) – The default link for the Poisson family is the log link. Available links are log, identity, and sqrt. See statsmodels.families.links for more information.
trans-unit.target: 链接（链接实例，可选）– Poisson系列的默认链接是日志链接。可用的链接是日志，身份和sqrt。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.families.links。

trans-unit.source: link (a link instance, optional) – The default link for the Tweedie family is the log link. Available links are log and Power. See statsmodels.genmod.families.links for more information.
trans-unit.target: 链接（链接实例，可选）– Tweedie系列的默认链接是日志链接。可用的链接是日志和电源。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.genmod.families.links。

trans-unit.source: link (a link instance, optional) – The default link for the inverse Gaussian family is the inverse squared link. Available links are inverse_squared, inverse, log, and identity. See statsmodels.genmod.families.links for more information.
trans-unit.target: 链接（链接实例，可选）–高斯逆族的默认链接是平方反比链接。可用链接为inverse_squared，inverse，log和identity。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.genmod.families.links。

trans-unit.source: link (a link instance, optional) – The default link for the negative binomial family is the log link. Available links are log, cloglog, identity, nbinom and power. See statsmodels.genmod.families.links for more information.
trans-unit.target: 链接（链接实例，可选）–负二项式族的默认链接是日志链接。可用的链接是日志，阻塞日志，身份，nbinom和电源。有关更多信息，请参见statsmodels.genmod.families.links。

trans-unit.source: ll – The value of the loglikelihood evaluated at (endog, mu, var_weights, freq_weights, scale) as defined below.
trans-unit.target: ll –如下定义的对数似然值（endog，mu，var_weights，freq_weights，scale）评估。

trans-unit.source: ll_i – The value of the loglikelihood evaluated at (endog, mu, var_weights, scale) as defined below.
trans-unit.target: ll_i –对数似然的值在（endog，mu，var_weights，scale）处定义，如下所示。

trans-unit.source: llf – The loglikelihood evaluated at params
trans-unit.target: llf –以 params 评估的对数似然

trans-unit.source: llf – The loglikelihood value at params
trans-unit.target: llf – params 对数似然值

trans-unit.source: llf – The value of the log-likelihood function for a WLS Model.
trans-unit.target: llf – WLS模型的对数似然函数的值。

trans-unit.source: llf (float) – The loglikelihood of the model evaluated at params. See AR.loglike
trans-unit.target: llf（float）–在 params 上评估的模型的对数似然。参见 AR.loglike

trans-unit.source: llf (float) – The model’s log-likelihood.
trans-unit.target: llf（float）–模型的对数似然。

trans-unit.source: llf (float) – The value of the log-likelihood function evaluated at params.
trans-unit.target: llf（float）–在 params 上评估的对数似然函数的值。

trans-unit.source: llf (float) – Value of the loglikelihood
trans-unit.target: llf（float）–对数似然值

trans-unit.source: llf (float) – Value of the loglikelihood function evalued at params. See statsmodels.families.family for distribution-specific loglikelihoods.
trans-unit.target: llf（float）–对数值似然函数的值，以params评估。请参阅statsmodels.families.family以了解特定于分布的对数可能性。

trans-unit.source: llf (float) – value of the loglikelihood
trans-unit.target: llf（float）–对数似然值

trans-unit.source: lli (list of tuples) – list of subsets with smaller than critical difference
trans-unit.target: lli（元组列表）–小于临界差的子集列表

trans-unit.source: llnull (None or float) – If llnull is not None, then the value will be directly assigned to the cached attribute “llnull”.
trans-unit.target: llnull（None 或float）–如果llnull不为None，则该值将直接分配给缓存的属性“ llnull”。

trans-unit.source: llnull (float) – Value of the constant-only loglikelihood
trans-unit.target: llnull（float）–仅常数对数似然的值

trans-unit.source: llr (float) – Likelihood ratio chi-squared statistic; -2*(llnull - llf)
trans-unit.target: llr（float）–似然比卡方统计； -2*(llnull - llf)

trans-unit.source: llr_pvalue (float) – The chi-squared probability of getting a log-likelihood ratio statistic greater than llr. llr has a chi-squared distribution with degrees of freedom df_model.
trans-unit.target: llr_pvalue（float）–使对数似然比统计值大于llr的卡方概率。 df_model 具有自由度为df_model的卡方分布。

trans-unit.source: lm (float) – Lagrange multiplier test statistic
trans-unit.target: lm（float）–拉格朗日乘数检验统计

trans-unit.source: lm (float) – lagrange multiplier statistic
trans-unit.target: lm（float）–拉格朗日乘数统计

trans-unit.source: lm_pval (float) – p-value of Lagrange multiplier tes
trans-unit.target: lm_pval（float）–拉格朗日乘数tes的p值

trans-unit.source: lm_pvalue (float) – p-value of lagrange multiplier test
trans-unit.target: lm_pvalue（float）–拉格朗日乘数检验的p值

trans-unit.source: lm_value (float) – test statistic, chi2 distributed
trans-unit.target: lm_value（float）–测试统计量，分布chi2

trans-unit.source: lmpval (float) – p-value for Lagrange multiplier test
trans-unit.target: lmpval（float）–拉格朗日乘数检验的p值

trans-unit.source: loading_pairs (None or a list of tuples) – Specify plots. Each tuple (i, j) represent one figure, i and j is the loading number for x-axis and y-axis, respectively. If None, all combinations of the loadings will be plotted.
trans-unit.target: loading_pairs（无或元组列表）–指定图。每个元组（i，j）代表一个图形，i和j分别是x轴和y轴的加载数。如果为 None ，则将绘制载荷的所有组合。

trans-unit.source: loadings – The return is a pandas Styler instance, if style is ‘display’ and at least one of highlight_max, threshold or decimals is applied. Otherwise, the returned loadings is a DataFrame.
trans-unit.target: loadings –返回值是pandas Styler实例，如果style为“ display”并且至少应用了highlight_max，threshold或小数之一。否则，返回的加载为DataFrame。

trans-unit.source: loc (array_like, optional) – Location parameter (default=0).
trans-unit.target: loc（array_like ，可选）–位置参数（默认= 0）。

trans-unit.source: loc (array_like, optional) – Location parameter, Default is 0.
trans-unit.target: loc（array_like ，可选）–位置参数，默认为0。

trans-unit.source: loc (array_like, optional) – location parameter (default=0)
trans-unit.target: loc（array_like ，可选）–位置参数（默认= 0）

trans-unit.source: loc (array_like, optional) – location parameter, Default is 0.
trans-unit.target: loc（array_like ，可选）–位置参数，默认为0。

trans-unit.source: loc (float) – Location parameter for dist
trans-unit.target: loc（float）– dist的位置参数

trans-unit.source: loc (float, optional) – Location parameter (default=0).
trans-unit.target: loc（float ，可选）–位置参数（默认= 0）。

trans-unit.source: log (bool or None) – If None, it is automatically determined whether to log the series or not. If False, logs are not taken. If True, logs are taken.
trans-unit.target: log（bool 或None）–如果为None，将自动确定是否记录该系列。如果为False，则不记录日志。如果为True，则记录日志。

trans-unit.source: log_scale (boot, optional) – Flag indicating whether ot use a log scale for the y-axis
trans-unit.target: log_scale（boot ，可选）–指示ot是否使用y轴的对数刻度的标志

trans-unit.source: logcdf – Log of the cumulative distribution function evaluated at x
trans-unit.target: logcdf –在x处评估的累积分布函数的日志

trans-unit.source: loglike
trans-unit.target: loglike

trans-unit.source: loglike – Array of loglikelihood values for each observation.
trans-unit.target: loglike –每个观察值的对数似然值数组。

trans-unit.source: loglike – The joint loglikelihood.
trans-unit.target: loglike –联合对数似然。

trans-unit.source: loglike – The log likelihood for each observation of the model evaluated at params. See Notes
trans-unit.target: loglike –在 params 评估的模型每次观察的对数似然。见注释

trans-unit.source: loglike – The log likelihood of the model evaluated at params for each observation defined by self.endog and self.exog.
trans-unit.target: loglike – 由self.endog和self.exog定义的每个观察值在 params 评估的模型的对数可能性。

trans-unit.source: loglike – The log-likelihood function of the model evaluated at params. See notes.
trans-unit.target: loglike –在 params 上评估的模型的对数似然函数。请参阅注释。

trans-unit.source: loglike – The value of the log-likelihood function for a GLS Model.
trans-unit.target: loglike – GLS模型的对数似然函数的值。

trans-unit.source: loglike_method (string) –
trans-unit.target: loglike_method（字符串）–

trans-unit.source: loglikelihood_burn (int, optional) – The number of initial periods during which the loglikelihood is not recorded. Default is 0.
trans-unit.target: loglikelihood_burn（int ，可选）–不记录对数似然的初始时间段数。默认值为0。

trans-unit.source: logpdf – Log of the probability density function evaluated at x
trans-unit.target: logpdf –在x处评估的概率密度函数的对数

trans-unit.source: logsf – Log of the survival function evaluated at x.
trans-unit.target: logsf –在 x 处求值的生存函数的对数。

trans-unit.source: low (float) – Minimum period for oscillations, ie., Baxter and King suggest that the Burns-Mitchell U.S. business cycle has 6 for quarterly data and 1.5 for annual data.
trans-unit.target: 低（浮动）–振荡的最短周期，即Baxter和King建议美国Burns-Mitchell商业周期的季度数据为6，年度数据为1.5。

trans-unit.source: low (float) – Minimum period of oscillations. Features below low periodicity are filtered out. Default is 6 for quarterly data, giving a 1.5 year periodicity.
trans-unit.target: 低（浮动）–最小振荡周期。低周期性以下的特征被滤除。季度数据的默认值为6，周期为1.5年。

trans-unit.source: low (float, optional) – Low end of the bracketing interval [a,b] to be used in the search for the power. Defaults to 1.01.
trans-unit.target: 低（float ，可选）–用于搜索功率的包围间隔[a，b]的低端。默认为1.01。

trans-unit.source: lower, upper – lower and upper bound of confidence interval
trans-unit.target: 下，上 –置信区间的下限和上限

trans-unit.source: lower, upper – lower and upper limits of the confidence interval
trans-unit.target: 下，上 –置信区间的下限和上限

trans-unit.source: lower_bound (float) – Minimum value of kurtosis the lower limit can be. Default is .99 confidence limit assuming normality.
trans-unit.target: lower_bound（float）–峰度的最小值，可以为下限。假设正常，默认值为.99可信度限制。

trans-unit.source: lower_bound (float) – Minimum value of skewness the lower limit can be. Default is .99 confidence level assuming normality.
trans-unit.target: lower_bound（float）–下限可以是的偏度最小值。假设正常，默认值为.99置信度。

trans-unit.source: lower_bound (float) – Minimum value the lower condidence limit can be. Default is 99% confidence limit assuming normality.
trans-unit.target: lower_bound（float）–置信下限可以达到的最小值。假设正常，默认值为99％置信度限制。

trans-unit.source: lower_bound (float) – The minimum value the lower confidence interval can take. The p-value from test_var(lower_bound) must be lower than 1 - significance level. Default is .99 confidence limit assuming normality
trans-unit.target: lower_bound（float）–下置信度间隔可以采用的最小值。test_var（lower_bound）的p值必须小于1-显着性水平。假设正常，默认值为.99置信限

trans-unit.source: lower_bound (float) – The minimum value the lower limit can be. Default is the 99.9% confidence value under OLS assumptions.
trans-unit.target: lower_bound（float）–下限值可以是的最小值。在OLS假设下，默认值为99.9％置信度值。

trans-unit.source: lowess_args (dict-like) – Keyword arguments passed to lowess fit. A dictionary of dictionaries, keys are ‘o’ and ‘i’ denoting ‘observed’ and ‘imputed’, respectively.
trans-unit.target: lowess_args（dict-like）–传递给lowess fit的关键字参数。字典的字典，键分别为“ o”和“ i”，分别表示“已观察”和“估算”。

trans-unit.source: lowess_args (dictionary) – A dictionary of dictionaries, keys are ‘ii’, ‘io’, ‘oi’ and ‘oo’, where ‘o’ denotes ‘observed’ and ‘i’ denotes imputed. See Notes for details.
trans-unit.target: lowess_args（字典）–字典的字典，键为“ ii”，“ io”，“ oi”和“ oo”，其中“ o”表示“已观察”，“ i”表示推定。有关详细信息，请参见注释。

trans-unit.source: lowess_min_n (integer) – Minimum sample size to plot a lowess fit
trans-unit.target: lowess_min_n（整数）–绘制最低拟合的最小样本量

trans-unit.source: lr_stat (float) – likelihood ratio, chisquare distributed with df_diff degrees of freedom
trans-unit.target: lr_stat（float）–似然比，卡方分布为df_diff自由度

trans-unit.source: m0 (int) – ntest - rej, estimated number of true hypotheses
trans-unit.target: m0（int）– ntest-rej，真实假设的估计数量

trans-unit.source: m1_low (float) – Minimum value of the mean for variable 1
trans-unit.target: m1_low（float）–变量1的平均值的最小值

trans-unit.source: m1_upp (float) – Maximum value of the mean for variable 1
trans-unit.target: m1_upp（float）–变量1的平均值的最大值

trans-unit.source: m2 (m1,) –
trans-unit.target: 平方米（M1 ，） -

trans-unit.source: ma – coefficients of lag polynomial
trans-unit.target: ma –滞后多项式系数

trans-unit.source: ma (array_like) – moving average lag-polynomial with leading 1
trans-unit.target: ma（array_like）–移动平均滞后多项式，前导为1

trans-unit.source: ma (array_like, 1d) – coefficient for moving-average lag polynomial, including zero lag
trans-unit.target: ma（array_like ，1d）–移动平均滞后多项式的系数，包括零滞后

trans-unit.source: ma (array_like, 1d) – moving average lag polynomial
trans-unit.target: ma（array_like ，1d）–移动平均滞后多项式

trans-unit.source: ma (array_like, 1d, optional) – Coefficient for moving-average lag polynomial, including zero lag
trans-unit.target: ma（array_like ，1d ，可选）–移动平均滞后多项式的系数，包括零滞后

trans-unit.source: ma (array_like, same ndim as x, currently 2d) – moving average lag polynomial ma(L)x_t
trans-unit.target: ma（array_like ，与x相同的ndim ，当前为2d）–移动平均滞后多项式ma（L）x_t

trans-unit.source: ma (ndarray) – extended AR polynomial coefficients
trans-unit.target: ma（ndarray）–扩展的AR多项式系数

trans-unit.source: macoefs (array-like, optional) – Coefficient for moving-average lag polynomial, excluding zero lag
trans-unit.target: macoefs（类似数组的数组，可选）–移动平均滞后多项式的系数，不包括零滞后

trans-unit.source: mad – mad = median(abs(a - center))/c
trans-unit.target: 狂 - mad =中间值（ABS（ a -中心））/ c

trans-unit.source: maeigenvalues (complex array) – eigenvalues sorted by absolute value
trans-unit.target: maeigenvalues（复数数组）–特征值按绝对值排序

trans-unit.source: manew (array) – new invertible MA lag-polynomial, returned if retnew is false.
trans-unit.target: manew（数组）–新的可逆MA滞后多项式，如果retnew为false，则返回。

trans-unit.source: maparams (array) – The value of the moving average coefficients.
trans-unit.target: maparams（数组）–移动平均系数的值。
